function InitGlobals takes nothing returns nothing
    local integer i = 0
    set i = 0
    loop
        exitwhen (i > 1)
        set udg_r[i] = 0
        set i = i + 1
    endloop

    set i = 0
    loop
        exitwhen (i > 1)
        set udg_i[i] = 0
        set i = i + 1
    endloop

    set udg_mouse_pressed_L = false
    set udg_mouse_pressed_R = false
    set udg_action_swm_speed = 0
    set udg_action_swm_timer = CreateTimer()
    set udg_action_angle = 0
    set udg_action_swm_end_timer = CreateTimer()
    set udg_action_atk_timer = CreateTimer()
    set i = 0
    loop
        exitwhen (i > 1)
        set udg_projectile_speed[i] = 0
        set i = i + 1
    endloop

    set udg_projectile_group = CreateGroup()
    set udg_projectile_list = 0
    set udg_action_swm_active = false
    set udg_action_disabled = false
    set i = 0
    loop
        exitwhen (i > 1)
        set udg_projectile_damage[i] = 0
        set i = i + 1
    endloop

    set i = 0
    loop
        exitwhen (i > 1)
        set udg_ug[i] = CreateGroup()
        set i = i + 1
    endloop

    set i = 0
    loop
        exitwhen (i > 1)
        set udg_projectile_area[i] = 0
        set i = i + 1
    endloop

    set i = 0
    loop
        exitwhen (i > 1)
        set udg_projectile_amount[i] = 0
        set i = i + 1
    endloop

    set i = 0
    loop
        exitwhen (i > 1)
        set udg_projectile_expiration[i] = 0
        set i = i + 1
    endloop

    set udg_action_swm_inv_timer = CreateTimer()
    set udg_player_swm_invul = false
    set udg_enemy_group_current = CreateGroup()
    set udg_action_aiming = false
    set i = 0
    loop
        exitwhen (i > 1)
        set udg_projectile_size[i] = 0
        set i = i + 1
    endloop

    set udg_action_swm_charge = 0
    set udg_boss_turt_spec_timer = CreateTimer()
    set udg_boss_turt_spec_inc = 0
    set udg_boss_turt_spec_cd = 0
    set udg_boss_wtch_swm_cd_timer = CreateTimer()
    set udg_boss_wtch_swm_ready = false
    set udg_boss_wtch_swm_spd = 0
    set udg_boss_wtch_swm_angle = 0
    set udg_boss_wtch_swm_cd_min = 0
    set udg_boss_wtch_swm_timer = CreateTimer()
    set udg_boss_wtch_swm_duration = 0
    set udg_cin_frame = 0
    set udg_cin_timer = CreateTimer()
    set udg_player_hit_invul = false
    set udg_player_hit_invul_timer = CreateTimer()
    set udg_death_dialog = DialogCreate()
    set udg_player_hit_invul_time = 0
    set udg_enemy_spawn_value = 0
    set udg_boss_turt_audience = CreateGroup()
    set udg_boss_hydra_spec_cd = CreateTimer()
    set udg_boss_hydra_spec_prep = CreateTimer()
    set udg_cryst_rage_timer = CreateTimer()
    set udg_cryst_rage_duration = 0
    set udg_cryst_rage_dialog = DialogCreate()
    set udg_cryst_rage_toggled = false
    set udg_info_dialog = DialogCreate()
    set udg_rune_group = CreateGroup()
    set udg_rune_heal = 0
    set udg_rune_range = 0
    set udg_enemy_spawn_max = 0
    set udg_enemy_spawn_type_min = 0
    set udg_enemy_spawn_type_max = 0
    set udg_enemy_wiped_door = 0
    set udg_boss_turt_spec_exp = 0
    set udg_boulder_dmg = 0
    set udg_boss_wtch_swm_cd_max = 0
    set udg_cinematic_mode = false
    set i = 0
    loop
        exitwhen (i > 1)
        set udg_boss_turt_milestone[i] = false
        set i = i + 1
    endloop

    set udg_rune_lifespan = 0
    set udg_checkpoint = 0
    set udg_rage = 0
    set udg_fog_R = 0
    set udg_fog_G = 0
    set udg_fog_B = 0
    set udg_fog_Z = 0
    set udg_boss_wtch_swm_inc = 0
    set udg_boss_wtch_swm_inc_max = 0
    set udg_boss_turt_spec_area = 0
    set udg_boss_hydra_spec_timer = CreateTimer()
    set udg_boss_hydra_spec_cd_value = 0
    set udg_boss_hydra_spec_ready = false
    set udg_boss_wtch_vuln = false
    set udg_action_swm_charge_max = 0
endfunction

//***************************************************************************
//*
//*  Custom Script Code
//*
//***************************************************************************

//***************************************************************************
//*
//*  Sound Assets
//*
//***************************************************************************

function InitSounds takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_snd_Submerge1 = CreateSound( "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\Submerge\\Submerge1.wav", false, true, true, 10, 10, "SpellsEAX" )
    call SetSoundDuration( gg_snd_Submerge1, 1523 )
    call SetSoundChannel( gg_snd_Submerge1, 0 )
    call SetSoundVolume( gg_snd_Submerge1, -1 )
    call SetSoundPitch( gg_snd_Submerge1, 1.0 )
    call SetSoundDistances( gg_snd_Submerge1, 0.0, 10000.0 )
    call SetSoundDistanceCutoff( gg_snd_Submerge1, 3000.0 )
    call SetSoundConeAngles( gg_snd_Submerge1, 0.0, 0.0, 127 )
    call SetSoundConeOrientation( gg_snd_Submerge1, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0 )
    set gg_snd_iAbilitiesTurnPageB = CreateSound( "---Invalid Sound Filepath---", false, false, false, 10, 10, "DefaultEAXON" )
    call SetSoundDuration( gg_snd_iAbilitiesTurnPageB, 1523 )
    call SetSoundChannel( gg_snd_iAbilitiesTurnPageB, 0 )
    call SetSoundVolume( gg_snd_iAbilitiesTurnPageB, 127 )
    call SetSoundPitch( gg_snd_iAbilitiesTurnPageB, 1.0 )
    set gg_snd_ErglHuh = CreateSound( "Units\\Creeps\\Murloc\\MurlocPissed1.wav", false, true, true, 10, 10, "DefaultEAXON" )
    call SetSoundDuration( gg_snd_ErglHuh, 370 )
    call SetSoundChannel( gg_snd_ErglHuh, 0 )
    call SetSoundVolume( gg_snd_ErglHuh, -1 )
    call SetSoundPitch( gg_snd_ErglHuh, 1.0 )
    call SetSoundDistances( gg_snd_ErglHuh, 0.0, 10000.0 )
    call SetSoundDistanceCutoff( gg_snd_ErglHuh, 3000.0 )
    call SetSoundConeAngles( gg_snd_ErglHuh, 0.0, 0.0, 127 )
    call SetSoundConeOrientation( gg_snd_ErglHuh, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0 )
    set gg_snd_ErglAttack01 = CreateSound( "Units\\Creeps\\Murloc\\MurlocWhat1.wav", false, true, true, 10, 10, "DefaultEAXON" )
    call SetSoundDuration( gg_snd_ErglAttack01, 589 )
    call SetSoundChannel( gg_snd_ErglAttack01, 0 )
    call SetSoundVolume( gg_snd_ErglAttack01, -1 )
    call SetSoundPitch( gg_snd_ErglAttack01, 1.0 )
    call SetSoundDistances( gg_snd_ErglAttack01, 0.0, 10000.0 )
    call SetSoundDistanceCutoff( gg_snd_ErglAttack01, 3000.0 )
    call SetSoundConeAngles( gg_snd_ErglAttack01, 0.0, 0.0, 127 )
    call SetSoundConeOrientation( gg_snd_ErglAttack01, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0 )
    set gg_snd_ErglAttack02 = CreateSound( "Units\\Creeps\\Murloc\\MurlocWhat2.wav", false, true, true, 10, 10, "DefaultEAXON" )
    call SetSoundDuration( gg_snd_ErglAttack02, 608 )
    call SetSoundChannel( gg_snd_ErglAttack02, 0 )
    call SetSoundVolume( gg_snd_ErglAttack02, -1 )
    call SetSoundPitch( gg_snd_ErglAttack02, 1.0 )
    call SetSoundDistances( gg_snd_ErglAttack02, 0.0, 10000.0 )
    call SetSoundDistanceCutoff( gg_snd_ErglAttack02, 3000.0 )
    call SetSoundConeAngles( gg_snd_ErglAttack02, 0.0, 0.0, 127 )
    call SetSoundConeOrientation( gg_snd_ErglAttack02, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0 )
    set gg_snd_ErglAttack03 = CreateSound( "Units\\Creeps\\Murloc\\MurlocWhat3.wav", false, true, true, 10, 10, "DefaultEAXON" )
    call SetSoundDuration( gg_snd_ErglAttack03, 621 )
    call SetSoundChannel( gg_snd_ErglAttack03, 0 )
    call SetSoundVolume( gg_snd_ErglAttack03, -1 )
    call SetSoundPitch( gg_snd_ErglAttack03, 1.0 )

    call SetSoundDistanceCutoff( gg_snd_ErglAttack03, 3000.0 )

    call SetSoundConeOrientation( gg_snd_ErglAttack03, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0 )

    call SetSoundConeOrientation( gg_snd_Swim01, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0 )

    call SetSoundDuration( gg_snd_Swim02, 1509 )
    call SetSoundChannel( gg_snd_Swim02, 0 )
    call SetSoundVolume( gg_snd_Swim02, -1 )
    call SetSoundPitch( gg_snd_Swim02, 1.0 )
    call SetSoundDistances( gg_snd_Swim02, 0.0, 10000.0 )
    call SetSoundDistanceCutoff( gg_snd_Swim02, 3000.0 )

    call SetSoundConeOrientation( gg_snd_Swim02, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0 )
    set gg_snd_TempleTheme = "---Invalid Sound Filepath---"
    set gg_snd_BattleTheme = "---Invalid Sound Filepath---"
    set gg_snd_BossTurtleTheme = "---Invalid Sound Filepath---"
    set gg_snd_TurtleGrunt01 = CreateSound( "Units\\Creeps\\GiantSeaTurtle\\GiantSeaTurtleWhat1.wav", false, true, true, 10, 10, "DefaultEAXON" )
    call SetSoundDuration( gg_snd_TurtleGrunt01, 1866 )
    call SetSoundChannel( gg_snd_TurtleGrunt01, 0 )
    call SetSoundVolume( gg_snd_TurtleGrunt01, -1 )

    call SetSoundDistances( gg_snd_HydraGrunt01, 0.0, 10000.0 )

//***************************************************************************
//*
//*  Destructable Objects
//*
//***************************************************************************

function CreateAllDestructables takes nothing returns nothing
    local destructable d
    local trigger t
    local real life
    set gg_dest_ZTd5_0175 = BlzCreateDestructableZWithSkin( 'ZTd5', -448.0, -1152.0, 492.8, 270.000, 0.900, 0, 'ZTd5' )
    set gg_dest_ZTd5_1020 = BlzCreateDestructableZWithSkin( 'ZTd5', 5440.0, -2496.0, 492.8, 270.000, 0.900, 0, 'ZTd5' )
    set gg_dest_ZTd6_0824 = BlzCreateDestructableZWithSkin( 'ZTd6', 4864.0, -1856.0, 492.8, 0.000, 0.900, 0, 'ZTd6' )
    set gg_dest_ZTd6_0758 = BlzCreateDestructableZWithSkin( 'ZTd6', 2048.0, -1856.0, 492.8, 0.000, 0.900, 0, 'ZTd6' )
    set gg_dest_ZTd6_0806 = BlzCreateDestructableZWithSkin( 'ZTd6', 2304.0, 1472.0, 492.8, 0.000, 0.900, 0, 'ZTd6' )
    set gg_dest_ZTd6_1310 = BlzCreateDestructableZWithSkin( 'ZTd6', 5120.0, 704.0, 492.8, 0.000, 0.900, 0, 'ZTd6' )
    set gg_dest_ZTd7_0167 = BlzCreateDestructableZWithSkin( 'ZTd7', 448.0, 1088.0, 492.8, 90.000, 0.900, 0, 'ZTd7' )
    set gg_dest_ZTsg_1899 = BlzCreateDestructableZWithSkin( 'ZTsg', 6656.0, 2176.0, 518.4, 180.000, 1.000, 0, 'ZTsg' )
endfunction

//***************************************************************************
//*
//*  Unit Creation
//*
//***************************************************************************

//===========================================================================
function CreateUnitsForPlayer0 takes nothing returns nothing
    local player p = Player(0)
    local unit u
    local integer unitID
    local trigger t
    local real life

    set gg_unit_n000_0024 = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'n000', 9674.5, -1644.2, 310.000, 'n000' )
    set gg_unit_h002_0030 = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'h002', 9137.4, -4026.5, 134.941, 'h002' )
    set gg_unit_h000_0031 = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'h000', 8607.0, -3504.7, 214.196, 'h000' )
    set gg_unit_h001_0032 = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'h001', 12407.9, -1051.3, 104.487, 'h001' )
    set gg_unit_h003_0033 = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'h003', 10895.1, -3850.5, 185.960, 'h003' )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function CreateBuildingsForPlayer2 takes nothing returns nothing
    local player p = Player(2)
    local unit u
    local integer unitID
    local trigger t
    local real life

    set gg_unit_e000_0003 = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'e000', 8192.0, 1920.0, 270.000, 'e000' )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function CreateUnitsForPlayer2 takes nothing returns nothing
    local player p = Player(2)
    local unit u
    local integer unitID
    local trigger t
    local real life

    set gg_unit_h00C_0004 = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'h00C', 7560.7, 1910.0, 160.000, 'h00C' )
    call SetUnitColor( gg_unit_h00C_0004, ConvertPlayerColor(24) )
    set gg_unit_h00A_0028 = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'h00A', 278.8, 704.7, 330.584, 'h00A' )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function CreateNeutralHostile takes nothing returns nothing
    local player p = Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE)
    local unit u
    local integer unitID
    local trigger t
    local real life

    set u = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'n002', 3488.9, -1570.8, 118.010, 'n002' )
    set gg_unit_n003_0002 = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'n003', 160.6, -1249.8, 244.286, 'n003' )
    set gg_unit_n007_0005 = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'n007', 5145.4, -1126.2, 135.000, 'n007' )
    set u = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'n005', 7680.6, 1393.6, 359.010, 'n005' )
    set gg_unit_n003_0007 = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'n003', -352.2, 1885.0, 88.843, 'n003' )
    set u = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'n004', 3745.3, 1316.1, 348.570, 'n004' )
    set gg_unit_n003_0009 = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'n003', 5792.5, 225.3, 55.752, 'n003' )
    set gg_unit_n007_0010 = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'n007', -385.5, -2636.6, 45.000, 'n007' )
    set u = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'n005', 8695.9, 1394.5, 48.821, 'n005' )
    set u = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'n005', 7675.2, 2451.2, 336.144, 'n005' )
    set u = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'n005', 8694.5, 2443.7, 138.889, 'n005' )
    set gg_unit_n007_0027 = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'n007', 2099.0, 2299.4, 315.000, 'n007' )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function CreateNeutralPassive takes nothing returns nothing
    local player p = Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE)
    local unit u
    local integer unitID
    local trigger t
    local real life

    set gg_unit_h00G_0000 = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'h00G', -0.1, 1113.8, 257.740, 'h00G' )
    set gg_unit_h00D_0011 = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'h00D', -777.4, -1128.4, 54.878, 'h00D' )
    set gg_unit_h00E_0012 = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'h00E', -890.4, -1159.4, 51.575, 'h00E' )
    set gg_unit_h00F_0016 = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'h00F', -1026.3, -1115.5, 46.790, 'h00F' )
    set gg_unit_h00F_0017 = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'h00F', -1254.4, 76.5, 354.026, 'h00F' )
    set gg_unit_h00D_0018 = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'h00D', -1279.1, -337.0, 0.259, 'h00D' )
    set gg_unit_h00E_0019 = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'h00E', 804.7, 1127.7, 243.255, 'h00E' )
    set gg_unit_h00G_0020 = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'h00G', -1266.6, -166.1, 2.241, 'h00G' )
    set gg_unit_h00E_0021 = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'h00E', -1246.2, -54.8, 9.893, 'h00E' )
    set gg_unit_nmfs_0022 = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'nmfs', 10367.9, -2371.8, 134.841, 'nmfs' )
    set u = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'nmmu', 11340.2, -1939.7, 286.145, 'nmmu' )
    set u = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'nmrr', 10498.2, -2684.0, 184.458, 'nmrr' )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function CreatePlayerBuildings takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateBuildingsForPlayer2(  )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function CreatePlayerUnits takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateUnitsForPlayer0(  )
    call CreateUnitsForPlayer2(  )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function CreateAllUnits takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreatePlayerBuildings(  )
    call CreateNeutralHostile(  )
    call CreateNeutralPassive(  )
    call CreatePlayerUnits(  )
endfunction

//***************************************************************************
//*
//*  Regions
//*
//***************************************************************************

function CreateRegions takes nothing returns nothing
    local weathereffect we

    set gg_rct_Barrels01 = Rect( 2240.0, -1216.0, 2784.0, -832.0 )
    set gg_rct_Barrels02 = Rect( 4064.0, -1152.0, 4672.0, -832.0 )
    set gg_rct_Barrels03 = Rect( 2528.0, -2240.0, 3328.0, -1984.0 )
    set gg_rct_Barrels04 = Rect( 3904.0, -2240.0, 4672.0, -2048.0 )
    set gg_rct_Barrels05 = Rect( 832.0, -1696.0, 1376.0, -1600.0 )
    set gg_rct_Barrels06 = Rect( 1312.0, -2240.0, 1856.0, -2080.0 )
    set gg_rct_Barrels07 = Rect( -576.0, -2240.0, -320.0, -1952.0 )
    set gg_rct_Barrels08 = Rect( -1024.0, 608.0, -672.0, 960.0 )
    set gg_rct_Barrels09 = Rect( 576.0, 384.0, 832.0, 960.0 )
    set gg_rct_Barrels10 = Rect( 128.0, -960.0, 832.0, -672.0 )
    set gg_rct_Barrels11 = Rect( -1088.0, -960.0, -736.0, -576.0 )
    set gg_rct_Barrels12 = Rect( -576.0, 2304.0, 32.0, 2496.0 )
    set gg_rct_Barrels13 = Rect( 800.0, 2272.0, 1280.0, 2496.0 )
    set gg_rct_Barrels14 = Rect( 960.0, 1088.0, 1280.0, 1312.0 )
    set gg_rct_Barrels15 = Rect( 1696.0, 1088.0, 2112.0, 1280.0 )
    set gg_rct_Barrels16 = Rect( 2496.0, 2080.0, 2976.0, 2496.0 )
    set gg_rct_Barrels17 = Rect( 4224.0, 2112.0, 4928.0, 2496.0 )
    set gg_rct_Barrels18 = Rect( 2496.0, 320.0, 3296.0, 576.0 )
    set gg_rct_Barrels19 = Rect( 4672.0, 1024.0, 4928.0, 2016.0 )
    set gg_rct_Barrels20 = Rect( 5312.0, 1024.0, 5440.0, 2496.0 )
    set gg_rct_Barrels21 = Rect( 5824.0, 544.0, 5952.0, 1216.0 )
    set gg_rct_BoulderTrigger01 = Rect( 1280.0, -1856.0, 1696.0, -1632.0 )
    set gg_rct_BoulderTrigger02 = Rect( 864.0, -1824.0, 1344.0, -1600.0 )
    set gg_rct_BoulderTrigger03 = Rect( 1248.0, -2080.0, 1632.0, -1856.0 )
    set gg_rct_BoulderTrigger04 = Rect( 832.0, -1952.0, 1280.0, -1728.0 )
    set gg_rct_BoulderTrigger05 = Rect( 384.0, -1792.0, 864.0, -1632.0 )
    set gg_rct_BoulderTrigger06 = Rect( 768.0, -2144.0, 1312.0, -1920.0 )
    set gg_rct_BoulderTrigger07 = Rect( 576.0, -1952.0, 1120.0, -1760.0 )
    set gg_rct_BoulderTrigger08 = Rect( 384.0, -2176.0, 928.0, -1952.0 )
    set gg_rct_Checkpoint01 = Rect( 5024.0, -2016.0, 5216.0, -1568.0 )
    set gg_rct_Checkpoint02 = Rect( 1728.0, -2048.0, 1888.0, -1536.0 )
    set gg_rct_Checkpoint03 = Rect( -640.0, -1600.0, -64.0, -1344.0 )
    set gg_rct_Checkpoint04 = Rect( 64.0, 1248.0, 640.0, 1408.0 )
    set gg_rct_Checkpoint05 = Rect( 1888.0, 1280.0, 2176.0, 1792.0 )
    set gg_rct_Checkpoint06 = Rect( 5248.0, 544.0, 5472.0, 992.0 )
    set gg_rct_Checkpoint07 = Rect( 5984.0, 1792.0, 6560.0, 2560.0 )

//***************************************************************************
//*
//*  Cameras
//*
//***************************************************************************

function CreateCameras takes nothing returns nothing

    set gg_cam_Village_Opening1 = CreateCameraSetup(  )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Village_Opening1, CAMERA_FIELD_ZOFFSET, 0.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Village_Opening1, CAMERA_FIELD_ROTATION, 316.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Village_Opening1, CAMERA_FIELD_ANGLE_OF_ATTACK, 322.6, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Village_Opening1, CAMERA_FIELD_TARGET_DISTANCE, 819.6, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Village_Opening1, CAMERA_FIELD_ROLL, 0.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Village_Opening1, CAMERA_FIELD_FIELD_OF_VIEW, 120.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Village_Opening1, CAMERA_FIELD_FARZ, 10000.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Village_Opening1, CAMERA_FIELD_NEARZ, 16.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Village_Opening1, CAMERA_FIELD_LOCAL_PITCH, 0.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Village_Opening1, CAMERA_FIELD_LOCAL_YAW, 0.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Village_Opening1, CAMERA_FIELD_LOCAL_ROLL, 0.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetDestPosition( gg_cam_Village_Opening1, 9863.9, -1835.0, 0.0 )

    set gg_cam_Murgul2 = CreateCameraSetup(  )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Murgul2, CAMERA_FIELD_ZOFFSET, 0.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Murgul2, CAMERA_FIELD_ROTATION, 59.5, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Murgul2, CAMERA_FIELD_ANGLE_OF_ATTACK, 302.4, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Murgul2, CAMERA_FIELD_TARGET_DISTANCE, 901.6, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Murgul2, CAMERA_FIELD_ROLL, 0.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Murgul2, CAMERA_FIELD_FIELD_OF_VIEW, 120.0, 0.0 )

    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Sea_Witch1, CAMERA_FIELD_LOCAL_YAW, 0.0, 0.0 )

    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Murgul1, CAMERA_FIELD_LOCAL_PITCH, 0.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Murgul1, CAMERA_FIELD_LOCAL_YAW, 0.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Murgul1, CAMERA_FIELD_LOCAL_ROLL, 0.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetDestPosition( gg_cam_Murgul1, 3790.9, -1632.3, 0.0 )

    set gg_cam_Ending = CreateCameraSetup(  )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Ending, CAMERA_FIELD_ZOFFSET, 0.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Ending, CAMERA_FIELD_ROTATION, 314.8, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Ending, CAMERA_FIELD_ANGLE_OF_ATTACK, 324.3, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Ending, CAMERA_FIELD_TARGET_DISTANCE, 819.6, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Ending, CAMERA_FIELD_ROLL, 0.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Ending, CAMERA_FIELD_FIELD_OF_VIEW, 120.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Ending, CAMERA_FIELD_FARZ, 10000.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Ending, CAMERA_FIELD_NEARZ, 16.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Ending, CAMERA_FIELD_LOCAL_PITCH, 0.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Ending, CAMERA_FIELD_LOCAL_YAW, 0.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Ending, CAMERA_FIELD_LOCAL_ROLL, 0.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetDestPosition( gg_cam_Ending, 9532.5, -1428.6, 0.0 )

    set gg_cam_Gameplay = CreateCameraSetup(  )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Gameplay, CAMERA_FIELD_ZOFFSET, 0.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Gameplay, CAMERA_FIELD_ROTATION, 90.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Gameplay, CAMERA_FIELD_ANGLE_OF_ATTACK, 290.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Gameplay, CAMERA_FIELD_TARGET_DISTANCE, 1200.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Gameplay, CAMERA_FIELD_ROLL, 0.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Gameplay, CAMERA_FIELD_FIELD_OF_VIEW, 120.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Gameplay, CAMERA_FIELD_FARZ, 10000.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Gameplay, CAMERA_FIELD_NEARZ, 16.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Gameplay, CAMERA_FIELD_LOCAL_PITCH, 0.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Gameplay, CAMERA_FIELD_LOCAL_YAW, 0.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetField( gg_cam_Gameplay, CAMERA_FIELD_LOCAL_ROLL, 0.0, 0.0 )
    call CameraSetupSetDestPosition( gg_cam_Gameplay, 1336.0, -1021.4, 0.0 )

    set gg_cam_Temple_Entrance = CreateCameraSetup(  )

//***************************************************************************
//*
//*  Triggers
//*
//***************************************************************************

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Initialization
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Initialization_Func033A takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent( gg_trg_Take_Damage, GetEnumUnit(), EVENT_UNIT_DAMAGED )
endfunction

function Trig_Initialization_Func292Func002Func001Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_i[2] == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Initialization_Func292Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_i[1] > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Initialization_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    // Misc
    set udg_cryst_rage_duration = 1.00
    set udg_boulder_dmg = 1.00
    set udg_fog_R = 255.00
    set udg_fog_B = 255.00
    set udg_fog_G = 255.00
    set udg_fog_Z = 10000.00
    call GroupAddUnitSimple( gg_unit_h00E_0019, udg_boss_turt_audience )
    call GroupAddUnitSimple( gg_unit_h00G_0000, udg_boss_turt_audience )
    call GroupAddUnitSimple( gg_unit_h00F_0017, udg_boss_turt_audience )
    call GroupAddUnitSimple( gg_unit_h00D_0018, udg_boss_turt_audience )
    call GroupAddUnitSimple( gg_unit_h00G_0020, udg_boss_turt_audience )
    call GroupAddUnitSimple( gg_unit_h00E_0021, udg_boss_turt_audience )
    call GroupAddUnitSimple( gg_unit_h00F_0016, udg_boss_turt_audience )
    call GroupAddUnitSimple( gg_unit_h00D_0011, udg_boss_turt_audience )
    call GroupAddUnitSimple( gg_unit_h00E_0012, udg_boss_turt_audience )
    call SetUnitFlyHeightBJ( gg_unit_h00F_0017, 210.00, 0.00 )
    call SetUnitFlyHeightBJ( gg_unit_h00E_0021, 210.00, 0.00 )
    call SetUnitFlyHeightBJ( gg_unit_h00G_0020, 210.00, 0.00 )
    call SetUnitFlyHeightBJ( gg_unit_h00D_0018, 210.00, 0.00 )
    call SetUnitFlyHeightBJ( gg_unit_h00D_0011, 255.00, 0.00 )
    call SetUnitFlyHeightBJ( gg_unit_h00E_0012, 255.00, 0.00 )
    call SetUnitFlyHeightBJ( gg_unit_h00F_0016, 255.00, 0.00 )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A00G', gg_unit_h001_0032 )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A00G', gg_unit_h003_0033 )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A00G', gg_unit_h002_0030 )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A00G', gg_unit_h000_0031 )
    call ClearMapMusicBJ(  )
    call StopMusicBJ( false )
    call SetTimeOfDay( 12 )
    set udg_ug[1] = GetUnitsInRectAll(GetPlayableMapRect())
    call ForGroupBJ( udg_ug[1], function Trig_Initialization_Func033A )
    call DestroyGroup (udg_ug[1])
    set udg_door_destruct[1] = gg_dest_ZTd6_0824
    // Destructibles
    set udg_door_destruct[1] = gg_dest_ZTd5_1020
    set udg_door_destruct[2] = gg_dest_ZTd6_0824
    set udg_door_destruct[3] = gg_dest_ZTd6_0758
    set udg_door_destruct[4] = gg_dest_ZTd5_0175
    set udg_door_destruct[5] = gg_dest_ZTd7_0167
    set udg_door_destruct[6] = gg_dest_ZTd6_0806
    set udg_door_destruct[7] = gg_dest_ZTd6_1310
    set udg_door_destruct[8] = gg_dest_ZTsg_1899
    set udg_door_region[1] = gg_rct_DoorRegion01
    set udg_door_region[2] = gg_rct_DoorRegion02
    set udg_door_region[3] = gg_rct_DoorRegion03
    set udg_door_region[4] = gg_rct_DoorRegion04
    set udg_door_region[5] = gg_rct_DoorRegion05
    set udg_door_region[6] = gg_rct_DoorRegion06
    set udg_door_region[7] = gg_rct_DoorRegion07
    set udg_door_region[8] = gg_rct_DoorRegion08
    call ModifyGateBJ( bj_GATEOPERATION_OPEN, udg_door_destruct[8] )
    // Player Setup
    set udg_player = Player(0)
    set udg_player_enemy = Player(2)
    call SetPlayerColorBJ( udg_player_enemy, ConvertPlayerColor(24), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ( Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_player_enemy, bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ( udg_player, Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), bj_ALLIANCE_NEUTRAL )
    set udg_rune_heal = 2.00
    set udg_rune_range = 100.00
    set udg_rune_lifespan = 30.00
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Periodic_Runes )
    set udg_action_swm_speed = 60.00
    set udg_player_hit_invul_time = 0.10
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerMouseEventBJ( gg_trg_Cinematic_Frame_Change, udg_player, bj_MOUSEEVENTTYPE_DOWN )
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerMouseEventBJ( gg_trg_Mouse_Move, udg_player, bj_MOUSEEVENTTYPE_MOVE )
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerMouseEventBJ( gg_trg_Mouse_Press, udg_player, bj_MOUSEEVENTTYPE_DOWN )
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerMouseEventBJ( gg_trg_Mouse_Release, udg_player, bj_MOUSEEVENTTYPE_UP )
    set udg_p[1] = GetPlayerStartLocationLoc(udg_player)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n000', udg_player, udg_p[1], bj_UNIT_FACING )
    set udg_player_character = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call RemoveLocation (udg_p[1])
    call SetPlayerFlagBJ( PLAYER_STATE_GIVES_BOUNTY, false, Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE) )
    call SetUnitFlyHeightBJ( udg_player_character, 500.00, 0.00 )
    call AddUnitAnimationPropertiesBJ( true, "alternate", gg_unit_n000_0024 )
    set udg_p[1] = GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ErglSwimTo1)
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( gg_unit_n000_0024, "move", udg_p[1] )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A00G', gg_unit_n000_0024 )
    set udg_death_checkpoint_region[1] = gg_rct_Checkpoint01
    set udg_death_checkpoint_region[2] = gg_rct_Checkpoint02
    set udg_death_checkpoint_region[3] = gg_rct_Checkpoint03
    set udg_death_checkpoint_region[4] = gg_rct_Checkpoint04
    set udg_death_checkpoint_region[5] = gg_rct_Checkpoint05
    set udg_death_checkpoint_region[6] = gg_rct_Checkpoint06
    set udg_death_checkpoint_region[7] = gg_rct_Checkpoint07
    set udg_cam_current = gg_cam_Village_Opening1
    call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer( true, udg_cam_current, udg_player, 0.00 )
    // Projectiles & Enemies
    set udg_boss_hydra_spec_ready = true
    set udg_boss_hydra_spec_cd_value = 8.00
    set udg_boss_turtle = gg_unit_h00A_0028
    call SetUnitFlyHeightBJ( udg_boss_turtle, 1000.00, 0.00 )
    call PauseUnitBJ( true, udg_boss_turtle )
    set udg_boss_turt_spec_exp = 1.00
    set udg_boss_turt_spec_cd = 8.00
    set udg_boss_turt_spec_area = 130.00
    set udg_boss_hydra = gg_unit_e000_0003
    set udg_boss_wtch = gg_unit_h00C_0004
    set udg_p[1] = GetRectCenter(gg_rct_HydraArea)
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ( udg_boss_hydra, udg_p[1], 180.00 )
    call RemoveLocation (udg_p[1])
    call PauseUnitBJ( true, udg_boss_wtch )
    call PauseUnitBJ( true, udg_boss_hydra )
    call ShowUnitHide( udg_boss_hydra )
    set udg_boss_wtch_swm_ready = true
    set udg_boss_wtch_swm_duration = 0.20
    set udg_boss_wtch_swm_spd = 50.00
    set udg_boss_wtch_swm_inc_max = 1
    set udg_boss_wtch_swm_cd_min = 4.00
    set udg_boss_wtch_swm_cd_max = 8.00
    set udg_projectile_list = 16
    set udg_projectile_type[0] = 'A00B'
    set udg_projectile_type[1] = 'A000'
    set udg_projectile_type[2] = 'A00D'
    set udg_projectile_type[3] = 'A003'
    set udg_projectile_type[4] = 'A004'
    set udg_projectile_type[5] = 'A005'
    set udg_projectile_type[6] = 'A006'
    set udg_projectile_type[7] = 'A007'
    set udg_projectile_type[8] = 'A008'
    set udg_projectile_type[9] = 'A00E'
    set udg_projectile_type[10] = 'A00F'
    set udg_projectile_type[11] = 'A00H'
    set udg_projectile_type[12] = 'A00M'
    set udg_projectile_type[13] = 'A00N'
    set udg_projectile_type[14] = 'A00O'
    set udg_projectile_type[15] = 'A00P'
    set udg_projectile_type[16] = 'A00P'
    set udg_projectile_type[100] = 'A002'
    set udg_projectile_type[101] = 'A00I'
    set udg_projectile_speed[0] = 30.00
    set udg_projectile_speed[1] = 8.00
    set udg_projectile_speed[2] = 30.00
    set udg_projectile_speed[3] = 10.00
    set udg_projectile_speed[4] = 15.00
    set udg_projectile_speed[5] = 8.00
    set udg_projectile_speed[6] = 15.00
    set udg_projectile_speed[7] = 13.00
    set udg_projectile_speed[8] = 12.00
    set udg_projectile_speed[9] = 16.00
    set udg_projectile_speed[10] = 15.00
    set udg_projectile_speed[11] = 8.00
    set udg_projectile_speed[12] = 14.00
    set udg_projectile_speed[13] = 16.00
    set udg_projectile_speed[14] = 14.00
    set udg_projectile_speed[15] = 12.00
    set udg_projectile_speed[16] = 12.00
    set udg_projectile_speed[100] = 30.00
    set udg_projectile_speed[101] = 15.00
    set udg_projectile_size[0] = 50.00
    set udg_projectile_size[1] = 100.00
    set udg_projectile_size[2] = 50.00
    set udg_projectile_size[3] = 100.00
    set udg_projectile_size[4] = 80.00
    set udg_projectile_size[5] = 100.00
    set udg_projectile_size[6] = 100.00
    set udg_projectile_size[7] = 120.00
    set udg_projectile_size[8] = 150.00
    set udg_projectile_size[9] = 80.00
    set udg_projectile_size[10] = 100.00
    set udg_projectile_size[11] = 150.00
    set udg_projectile_size[12] = 80.00
    set udg_projectile_size[13] = 150.00
    set udg_projectile_size[14] = 140.00
    set udg_projectile_size[15] = 130.00
    set udg_projectile_size[16] = 180.00
    set udg_projectile_size[100] = 75.00
    set udg_projectile_size[101] = 75.00
    set udg_projectile_expiration[0] = 5.00
    set udg_projectile_expiration[1] = 1.60
    set udg_projectile_expiration[2] = 5.00
    set udg_projectile_expiration[3] = 5.00
    set udg_projectile_expiration[4] = 6.00
    set udg_projectile_expiration[5] = 5.00
    set udg_projectile_expiration[6] = 5.00
    set udg_projectile_expiration[7] = 1.00
    set udg_projectile_expiration[8] = 5.00
    set udg_projectile_expiration[9] = 6.00
    set udg_projectile_expiration[10] = 5.00
    set udg_projectile_expiration[11] = 10.00
    set udg_projectile_expiration[12] = 10.00
    set udg_projectile_expiration[13] = 10.00
    set udg_projectile_expiration[14] = 10.00
    set udg_projectile_expiration[15] = 10.00
    set udg_projectile_expiration[16] = 10.00
    set udg_projectile_expiration[100] = 5.00
    set udg_projectile_expiration[101] = 5.00
    set udg_projectile_area[0] = 50.00
    set udg_projectile_area[1] = 30.00
    set udg_projectile_area[2] = 25.00
    set udg_projectile_area[3] = 30.00
    set udg_projectile_area[4] = 30.00
    set udg_projectile_area[5] = 25.00
    set udg_projectile_area[6] = 40.00
    set udg_projectile_area[7] = 30.00
    set udg_projectile_area[8] = 40.00
    set udg_projectile_area[9] = 20.00
    set udg_projectile_area[10] = 20.00
    set udg_projectile_area[11] = 45.00
    set udg_projectile_area[12] = 20.00
    set udg_projectile_area[13] = 45.00
    set udg_projectile_area[14] = 40.00
    set udg_projectile_area[15] = 35.00
    set udg_projectile_area[16] = 70.00
    set udg_projectile_area[100] = 90.00
    set udg_projectile_area[101] = 60.00
    set udg_projectile_damage[0] = 1.00
    set udg_projectile_damage[1] = 1.00
    set udg_projectile_damage[2] = 1.00
    set udg_projectile_damage[3] = 1.00
    set udg_projectile_damage[4] = 1.00
    set udg_projectile_damage[5] = 1.00
    set udg_projectile_damage[6] = 1.00
    set udg_projectile_damage[7] = 1.00
    set udg_projectile_damage[8] = 1.00
    set udg_projectile_damage[9] = 1.00
    set udg_projectile_damage[10] = 1.00
    set udg_projectile_damage[11] = 1.00
    set udg_projectile_damage[12] = 1.00
    set udg_projectile_damage[13] = 1.00
    set udg_projectile_damage[14] = 1.00
    set udg_projectile_damage[15] = 1.00
    set udg_projectile_damage[16] = 1.00
    set udg_projectile_damage[100] = 0.50
    set udg_projectile_damage[101] = 1.00
    set udg_projectile_amount[1] = -1
    set udg_projectile_amount[2] = 0
    set udg_projectile_amount[3] = 4
    set udg_projectile_amount[4] = 2
    set udg_projectile_amount[5] = 1
    set udg_projectile_amount[6] = 2
    set udg_projectile_amount[7] = 4
    set udg_projectile_amount[8] = 6
    set udg_projectile_amount[9] = 5
    set udg_projectile_amount[10] = 0
    set udg_projectile_amount[11] = 0
    set udg_projectile_amount[12] = 1
    set udg_projectile_amount[13] = 0
    set udg_projectile_amount[14] = 0
    set udg_projectile_amount[15] = 0
    set udg_projectile_amount[16] = 0
    set udg_projectile_amount[100] = 1
    set udg_projectile_amount[101] = 1
    set udg_enemy_type[1] = 'h000'
    set udg_enemy_type[2] = 'h001'
    set udg_enemy_type[3] = 'h002'
    set udg_enemy_type[4] = 'h003'
    set udg_enemy_type[5] = 'h004'
    set udg_enemy_type[6] = 'h006'
    set udg_enemy_type[7] = 'h009'
    set udg_enemy_type[8] = 'h007'
    set udg_enemy_type[9] = 'h008'
    set udg_enemy_type[10] = 'h005'
    set udg_enemy_type[11] = 'h00A'
    set udg_enemy_type[12] = 'h00C'
    set udg_enemy_type[13] = 'e000'
    // Sounds
    set udg_action_atk_snd[1] = gg_snd_ErglAttack01
    set udg_action_atk_snd[2] = gg_snd_ErglAttack02
    set udg_action_atk_snd[3] = gg_snd_ErglAttack03
    set udg_action_swm_snd[1] = gg_snd_Swim01
    set udg_action_swm_snd[2] = gg_snd_Swim02
    set udg_cin_frame_snd = gg_snd_iAbilitiesTurnPageB
    set udg_door_close_rolling_snd = gg_snd_RollingDoorClose
    // Objects
    set udg_rage_crystal[1] = gg_unit_n003_0002
    set udg_rage_crystal[2] = gg_unit_n003_0007
    set udg_rage_crystal[3] = gg_unit_n003_0009
    set udg_barrel_reg[1] = gg_rct_Barrels01
    set udg_barrel_reg[2] = gg_rct_Barrels02
    set udg_barrel_reg[3] = gg_rct_Barrels03
    set udg_barrel_reg[4] = gg_rct_Barrels04
    set udg_barrel_reg[5] = gg_rct_Barrels05
    set udg_barrel_reg[6] = gg_rct_Barrels06
    set udg_barrel_reg[7] = gg_rct_Barrels07
    set udg_barrel_reg[8] = gg_rct_Barrels08
    set udg_barrel_reg[9] = gg_rct_Barrels09
    set udg_barrel_reg[10] = gg_rct_Barrels10
    set udg_barrel_reg[11] = gg_rct_Barrels11
    set udg_barrel_reg[12] = gg_rct_Barrels12
    set udg_barrel_reg[13] = gg_rct_Barrels13
    set udg_barrel_reg[14] = gg_rct_Barrels14
    set udg_barrel_reg[15] = gg_rct_Barrels15
    set udg_barrel_reg[16] = gg_rct_Barrels16
    set udg_barrel_reg[17] = gg_rct_Barrels17
    set udg_barrel_reg[18] = gg_rct_Barrels18
    set udg_barrel_reg[19] = gg_rct_Barrels19
    set udg_barrel_reg[20] = gg_rct_Barrels20
    set udg_barrel_reg[21] = gg_rct_Barrels21
    set udg_barrel_reg[22] = gg_rct_Barrels22
    set bj_forLoopAIndex = 1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd = 22
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        set udg_i[1] = GetRandomInt(0, 3)
        if ( Trig_Initialization_Func292Func002C() ) then
            set bj_forLoopBIndex = 1
            set bj_forLoopBIndexEnd = udg_i[1]
            loop
                exitwhen bj_forLoopBIndex > bj_forLoopBIndexEnd
                set udg_p[1] = GetRandomLocInRect(udg_barrel_reg[GetForLoopIndexA()])
                set udg_i[2] = GetRandomInt(1, 2)
                if ( Trig_Initialization_Func292Func002Func001Func003C() ) then
                    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n00A', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_p[1], GetRandomDirectionDeg() )
                else
                    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n00B', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_p[1], GetRandomDirectionDeg() )
                endif
                call RemoveLocation (udg_p[1])
                set bj_forLoopBIndex = bj_forLoopBIndex + 1
            endloop
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex = bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    // Mur'gul Ending
    set udg_murg_return_reg_a[1] = gg_rct_ReturnMurgul01a
    set udg_murg_return_reg_a[2] = gg_rct_ReturnMurgul02a
    set udg_murg_return_reg_a[3] = gg_rct_ReturnMurgul03a
    set udg_murg_return_reg_a[4] = gg_rct_ReturnMurgul04a
    set udg_murg_return_reg_a[5] = gg_rct_ReturnMurgul05a
    set udg_murg_return_reg_a[6] = gg_rct_ReturnMurgul06a
    set udg_murg_return_reg_a[7] = gg_rct_ReturnMurgul07a
    set udg_murg_return_reg_a[8] = gg_rct_ReturnMurgul08a
    set udg_murg_return_reg_a[9] = gg_rct_ReturnMurgul09a
    set udg_murg_return_reg_a[10] = gg_rct_ReturnMurgul10a
    set udg_murg_return_reg_b[1] = gg_rct_ReturnMurgul01b
    set udg_murg_return_reg_b[2] = gg_rct_ReturnMurgul02b
    set udg_murg_return_reg_b[3] = gg_rct_ReturnMurgul03a
    set udg_murg_return_reg_b[4] = gg_rct_ReturnMurgul04a
    set udg_murg_return_reg_b[5] = gg_rct_ReturnMurgul05a
    set udg_murg_return_reg_b[6] = gg_rct_ReturnMurgul06a
    set udg_murg_return_reg_b[7] = gg_rct_ReturnMurgul07a
    set udg_murg_return_reg_b[8] = gg_rct_ReturnMurgul08a
    set udg_murg_return_reg_b[9] = gg_rct_ReturnMurgul09a
    set udg_murg_return_reg_b[10] = gg_rct_ReturnMurgul10a
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Initialization takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Initialization = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Initialization, function Trig_Initialization_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Environment Load
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Environment_Load_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call UseTimeOfDayBJ( false )
    call SetSkyModel( "Environment\\Sky\\BlizzardSky\\BlizzardSky.mdx" )
    call SetDayNightModels("Environment\\DNC\\DNCLordaeron\\DNCLordaeronTerrain\\DNCLordaeronTerrain.mdl" , "Environment\\DNC\\DNCLordaeron\\DNCLordaeronUnit\\DNCLordaeronUnit.mdl")
    call SetTerrainFogExBJ( 0, 0.00, udg_fog_Z, 0, ( udg_fog_R / 2.55 ), ( udg_fog_G / 2.55 ), ( udg_fog_B / 2.55 ) )
    call StopSound(bj_nightAmbientSound, true, true)
    call StopSound(bj_dayAmbientSound, true, true)
    call EnableSelect( false, false )
    call EnablePreSelect( false, true )
    call EnableDragSelect( false, false )
    call FogEnableOff(  )
    call FogMaskEnableOff(  )
    call BlzHideOriginFrames(true)
    call BlzFrameSetVisible(BlzGetFrameByName("ConsoleUIBackdrop",0), false)
    call BlzFrameSetAllPoints(BlzGetOriginFrame(ORIGIN_FRAME_WORLD_FRAME, 0), BlzGetOriginFrame(ORIGIN_FRAME_GAME_UI, 0))
    call BlzFrameSetVisible(BlzGetFrameByName("UpperButtonBarFrame",0),true)
    call BlzFrameSetVisible(BlzGetFrameByName("UpperButtonBarAlliesButton",0),false)
    call BlzFrameSetVisible(BlzGetFrameByName("UpperButtonBarChatButton",0),false)
    call BlzFrameSetVisible(BlzGetFrameByName("UpperButtonBarQuestsButton",0),false)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Environment_Load takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Environment_Load = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle( gg_trg_Environment_Load, 0.00 )
    call TriggerRegisterGameLoadedEventBJ( gg_trg_Environment_Load )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Environment_Load, function Trig_Environment_Load_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Setup
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Setup_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DialogAddButtonBJ( udg_info_dialog, "TRIGSTR_348" )
    call DialogSetMessageBJ( udg_info_dialog, "TRIGSTR_349" )
    call DialogAddButtonBJ( udg_death_dialog, "TRIGSTR_260" )
    call DialogAddButtonBJ( udg_cryst_rage_dialog, "TRIGSTR_346" )
    call DialogSetMessageBJ( udg_cryst_rage_dialog, "TRIGSTR_262" )
    call ClearMapMusicBJ(  )
    call StopMusicBJ( false )
    call ModifyGateBJ( bj_GATEOPERATION_OPEN, gg_dest_ZTd5_1020 )
    call CinematicFadeBJ( bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEOUT, 0.00, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\Black_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0 )
    set udg_action_disabled = true
    set udg_cinematic_mode = true
    call SetSkyModel( "Environment\\Sky\\LordaeronSummerSky\\LordaeronSummerSky.mdl" )
    call StartTimerBJ( udg_cin_timer, false, 0.00 )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Setup takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Setup = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle( gg_trg_Setup, 0.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Setup, function Trig_Setup_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Periodic Cam
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Periodic_Cam_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_p[1] = GetUnitLoc(udg_player_character)
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer( udg_player, udg_p[1], 0.30 )
    call RemoveLocation (udg_p[1])
    call SetCameraFieldForPlayer( udg_player, CAMERA_FIELD_ANGLE_OF_ATTACK, 290.00, 0.30 )
    call SetCameraFieldForPlayer( udg_player, CAMERA_FIELD_ROTATION, 90.00, 0.30 )
    call SetCameraFieldForPlayer( udg_player, CAMERA_FIELD_TARGET_DISTANCE, 1200.00, 0.30 )
    call SetCameraFieldForPlayer( udg_player, CAMERA_FIELD_FIELD_OF_VIEW, 120.00, 0.30 )
    call SetCameraFieldForPlayer( udg_player, CAMERA_FIELD_FARZ, 10000.00, 0.30 )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Periodic_Cam takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Periodic_Cam = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Periodic_Cam )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_Periodic_Cam, 0.03 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Periodic_Cam, function Trig_Periodic_Cam_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: New Unit
//===========================================================================
function Trig_New_Unit_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != 'n001' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_New_Unit_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent( gg_trg_Take_Damage, GetTriggerUnit(), EVENT_UNIT_DAMAGED )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_New_Unit takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_New_Unit = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_New_Unit, GetPlayableMapRect() )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_New_Unit, Condition( function Trig_New_Unit_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_New_Unit, function Trig_New_Unit_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Rage Crystal End
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Rage_Crystal_End_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call CameraClearNoiseForPlayer( udg_player )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Rage_Crystal_End takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Rage_Crystal_End = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ( gg_trg_Rage_Crystal_End, udg_cryst_rage_timer )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Rage_Crystal_End, function Trig_Rage_Crystal_End_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Door 01
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Door_01_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsDestructableAliveBJ(udg_door_destruct[1]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'n001' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Door_01_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call KillUnit( GetTriggerUnit() )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Door_01 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Door_01 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_Door_01, gg_rct_DoorRegion01 )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Door_01, Condition( function Trig_Door_01_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Door_01, function Trig_Door_01_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Door 02
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Door_02_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsDestructableAliveBJ(udg_door_destruct[2]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'n001' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Door_02_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call KillUnit( GetTriggerUnit() )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Door_02 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Door_02 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_Door_02, gg_rct_DoorRegion02 )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Door_02, Condition( function Trig_Door_02_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Door_02, function Trig_Door_02_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Door 03
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Door_03_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsDestructableAliveBJ(udg_door_destruct[3]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'n001' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true

    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Door_03, function Trig_Door_03_Actions )

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Boulder 01
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Boulder_01_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_player_character ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Boulder_01_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger( GetTriggeringTrigger() )
    set udg_p[1] = GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_BoulderTrigger01)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n001', udg_player_enemy, udg_p[1], 270.00 )
    call SetUnitFlyHeightBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 0.00, 0.00 )
    call SetUnitScalePercent( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 150.00, 150.00, 150.00 )
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ( 1.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A00S', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n001', udg_player_enemy, udg_p[1], 270.00 )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A00T', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call SetUnitFlyHeightBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 1000.00, 0.00 )
    call SetUnitFlyHeightBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 0.00, 1000.00 )
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ( 1.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call RemoveLocation (udg_p[1])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Boulder_01 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Boulder_01 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_Boulder_01, gg_rct_BoulderTrigger01 )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Boulder_01, Condition( function Trig_Boulder_01_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Boulder_01, function Trig_Boulder_01_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Boulder 02
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Boulder_02_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_player_character ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Boulder_02_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger( GetTriggeringTrigger() )
    set udg_p[1] = GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_BoulderTrigger02)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n001', udg_player_enemy, udg_p[1], 270.00 )
    call SetUnitFlyHeightBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 0.00, 0.00 )
    call SetUnitScalePercent( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 150.00, 150.00, 150.00 )
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ( 1.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A00S', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n001', udg_player_enemy, udg_p[1], 270.00 )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A00T', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call SetUnitFlyHeightBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 1000.00, 0.00 )
    call SetUnitFlyHeightBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 0.00, 1000.00 )
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ( 1.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call RemoveLocation (udg_p[1])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Boulder_02 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Boulder_02 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_Boulder_02, gg_rct_BoulderTrigger02 )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Boulder_02, Condition( function Trig_Boulder_02_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Boulder_02, function Trig_Boulder_02_Actions )
endfunction

    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A00T', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call SetUnitFlyHeightBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 1000.00, 0.00 )

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Ergl Swim 01
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Ergl_Swim_01_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == gg_unit_n000_0024 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Ergl_Swim_01_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_p[1] = GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ErglSwimTo2)
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), "move", udg_p[1] )
    call RemoveLocation (udg_p[1])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Ergl_Swim_01 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Ergl_Swim_01 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_Ergl_Swim_01, gg_rct_ErglSwimPatrol1 )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Ergl_Swim_01, Condition( function Trig_Ergl_Swim_01_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Ergl_Swim_01, function Trig_Ergl_Swim_01_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Ergl Swim 02
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Ergl_Swim_02_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == gg_unit_n000_0024 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Ergl_Swim_02_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_p[1] = GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_ErglSwimTo1)
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), "move", udg_p[1] )
    call RemoveLocation (udg_p[1])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Ergl_Swim_02 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Ergl_Swim_02 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_Ergl_Swim_02, gg_rct_ErglSwimPatrol2 )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Ergl_Swim_02, Condition( function Trig_Ergl_Swim_02_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Ergl_Swim_02, function Trig_Ergl_Swim_02_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Cinematic Frame Change
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Cinematic_Frame_Change_Func005Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_cin_frame >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_cin_frame <= 10 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cinematic_Frame_Change_Func005Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_cin_frame >= 18 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_cin_frame <= 21 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cinematic_Frame_Change_Func005Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_cin_frame >= 35 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_cin_frame <= 36 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cinematic_Frame_Change_Func005Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_cin_frame >= 42 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_cin_frame <= 44 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cinematic_Frame_Change_Func005Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_cin_frame >= 51 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_cin_frame <= 54 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cinematic_Frame_Change_Func005Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_cin_frame >= 57 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_cin_frame <= 61 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cinematic_Frame_Change_Func005Func010C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_cin_frame >= 65 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_cin_frame <= 69 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cinematic_Frame_Change_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( Trig_Cinematic_Frame_Change_Func005Func001C() ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( Trig_Cinematic_Frame_Change_Func005Func002C() ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( udg_cin_frame == 27 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( udg_cin_frame == 29 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( Trig_Cinematic_Frame_Change_Func005Func005C() ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( Trig_Cinematic_Frame_Change_Func005Func006C() ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( Trig_Cinematic_Frame_Change_Func005Func007C() ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( Trig_Cinematic_Frame_Change_Func005Func008C() ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( udg_cin_frame == 63 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( Trig_Cinematic_Frame_Change_Func005Func010C() ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Cinematic_Frame_Change_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Cinematic_Frame_Change_Func005C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_action_disabled == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cinematic_Frame_Change_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_cin_frame = ( udg_cin_frame + 1 )
    call StopSoundBJ( udg_cin_frame_snd, false )
    call PlaySoundBJ( udg_cin_frame_snd )
    call StartTimerBJ( udg_cin_timer, false, 0.00 )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Cinematic_Frame_Change takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Cinematic_Frame_Change = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Cinematic_Frame_Change, Condition( function Trig_Cinematic_Frame_Change_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Cinematic_Frame_Change, function Trig_Cinematic_Frame_Change_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Cinematic Frames
//
// Narraration:
// |cffafafaf
// Ergl:
// |cffe6ff50
// Flargl:
// |cff64ffa0
// Minion:
// |cff8cffff
// Siren:
// |cffc8ffff
// Sea Witch:
// |cffffb4c8
// Berserker:
// |cffff8c50
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Cinematic_Frames_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_cin_frame == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cinematic_Frames_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_cin_frame == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not ( udg_cin_frame == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true

function Trig_Cinematic_Frames_Func037Func010Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()) == udg_player_enemy ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cinematic_Frames_Func037Func011002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'h005' )
endfunction

function Trig_Cinematic_Frames_Func037Func012002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call KillUnit( GetEnumUnit() )
endfunction

function Trig_Cinematic_Frames_Func072Func005002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitFacingToFaceUnitTimed( GetEnumUnit(), gg_unit_nmfs_0022, 0 )
endfunction

    if ( not ( udg_cin_frame == 63 ) ) then
        return false

function Trig_Cinematic_Frames_Func079C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_cin_frame == 70 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cinematic_Frames_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    // Opening
    if ( Trig_Cinematic_Frames_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_p[1] = GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Flargl2)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( gg_unit_nmfs_0022, "move", udg_p[1] )
        call RemoveLocation (udg_p[1])
        set udg_cin_frame = ( udg_cin_frame + 1 )
        call PlayMusicBJ( gg_snd_VillageTheme )
        set udg_fog_R = 255.00
        set udg_fog_B = 255.00
        set udg_fog_G = 255.00
        set udg_fog_Z = 10000.00
        call SetTerrainFogExBJ( 0, 0.00, udg_fog_Z, 0, ( udg_fog_R * 2.55 ), ( udg_fog_G * 2.55 ), ( udg_fog_B * 2.55 ) )
        call SetDayNightModels("Environment\\DNC\\DNCDalaran\\DNCDalaranTerrain\\DNCDalaranTerrain.mdl" , "Environment\\DNC\\DNCDalaran\\DNCDalaranUnit\\DNCDalaranUnit.mdl")
        call SetTerrainFogExBJ( 0, 0.00, 10000.00, 0, 100.00, 100.00, 100.00 )
        call ShowInterfaceForceOff( GetPlayersAll(), 0.00 )
        call CinematicFadeBJ( bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEIN, 2.00, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\Black_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0 )
        call StartTimerBJ( udg_cin_timer, false, 2.00 )
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Cinematic_Frames_Func003C() ) then
        call PlaySoundBJ( udg_cin_frame_snd )
        call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ( GetPlayersAll(), gg_unit_nmfs_0022, "TRIGSTR_360", null, "TRIGSTR_361", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 9999.00, true )
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Cinematic_Frames_Func004C() ) then
        call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ( GetPlayersAll(), gg_unit_n000_0024, "TRIGSTR_380", null, "TRIGSTR_381", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 9999.00, true )
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Cinematic_Frames_Func005C() ) then
        call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ( GetPlayersAll(), gg_unit_nmfs_0022, "TRIGSTR_362", null, "TRIGSTR_363", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 9999.00, true )
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Cinematic_Frames_Func006C() ) then
        call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Ergl_Swim_01 )
        call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Ergl_Swim_02 )
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( gg_unit_n000_0024, "stop" )
        call SetUnitFacingToFaceUnitTimed( gg_unit_n000_0024, gg_unit_nmfs_0022, 0 )
        set udg_cam_current = gg_cam_Village_Opening2
        call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer( true, udg_cam_current, udg_player, 1.00 )
        call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ( GetPlayersAll(), gg_unit_n000_0024, "TRIGSTR_378", null, "TRIGSTR_379", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 9999.00, true )
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Cinematic_Frames_Func007C() ) then
        call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ( GetPlayersAll(), gg_unit_nmfs_0022, "TRIGSTR_364", null, "TRIGSTR_365", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 9999.00, true )
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Cinematic_Frames_Func008C() ) then
        set udg_p[1] = GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_n000_0024)
        call PlaySoundAtPointBJ( gg_snd_ErglHuh, 50.00, udg_p[1], 0 )
        call RemoveLocation (udg_p[1])
        call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ( GetPlayersAll(), gg_unit_n000_0024, "TRIGSTR_376", null, "TRIGSTR_377", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 9999.00, true )
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Cinematic_Frames_Func009C() ) then
        call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ( GetPlayersAll(), gg_unit_nmfs_0022, "TRIGSTR_366", null, "TRIGSTR_367", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 9999.00, true )
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Cinematic_Frames_Func010C() ) then
        call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ( GetPlayersAll(), gg_unit_n000_0024, "TRIGSTR_374", null, "TRIGSTR_375", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 9999.00, true )
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Cinematic_Frames_Func011C() ) then
        call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ( GetPlayersAll(), gg_unit_nmfs_0022, "TRIGSTR_370", null, "TRIGSTR_371", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 9999.00, true )
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Cinematic_Frames_Func012C() ) then
        call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ( GetPlayersAll(), gg_unit_n000_0024, "TRIGSTR_372", null, "TRIGSTR_373", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 9999.00, true )
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Cinematic_Frames_Func013C() ) then
        set udg_cin_frame = ( udg_cin_frame + 1 )
        call ForceUICancelBJ( udg_player )
        call CinematicFadeBJ( bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEOUT, 2.00, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\Black_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0 )
        call StartTimerBJ( udg_cin_timer, false, 2.00 )
        set udg_p[1] = GetRectCenter(gg_rct_ErglSwimLeave)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( gg_unit_n000_0024, "move", udg_p[1] )
        call RemoveLocation (udg_p[1])
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Cinematic_Frames_Func014C() ) then
        set udg_cin_frame = ( udg_cin_frame + 1 )
        call ClearMapMusicBJ(  )
        call StopMusicBJ( false )
        call StartTimerBJ( udg_cin_timer, false, 1.00 )
        return
    else
    endif
    // Temple Entrance
    if ( Trig_Cinematic_Frames_Func016C() ) then
        set udg_cin_frame = ( udg_cin_frame + 1 )
        call SetSkyModel( "Environment\\Sky\\BlizzardSky\\BlizzardSky.mdx" )
        call AddUnitAnimationPropertiesBJ( true, "alternate", udg_player_character )
        call SetDayNightModels("Environment\\DNC\\DNCLordaeron\\DNCLordaeronTerrain\\DNCLordaeronTerrain.mdl" , "Environment\\DNC\\DNCLordaeron\\DNCLordaeronUnit\\DNCLordaeronUnit.mdl")
        set udg_cam_current = gg_cam_Temple_Entrance
        call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer( true, udg_cam_current, udg_player, 0.00 )
        set udg_fog_R = 50.00
        set udg_fog_B = 120.00
        set udg_fog_G = 120.00
        set udg_fog_Z = 2200.00
        call SetTerrainFogExBJ( 0, 0.00, udg_fog_Z, 0, ( udg_fog_R / 2.55 ), ( udg_fog_G / 2.55 ), ( udg_fog_B / 2.55 ) )
        call CinematicFadeBJ( bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEIN, 1.00, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\Black_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0 )
        call SetUnitFlyHeightBJ( udg_player_character, 0.00, 90.00 )
        set udg_p[1] = GetRectCenter(gg_rct_DoorRegion01Close)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_player_character, "move", udg_p[1] )
        call RemoveLocation (udg_p[1])
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Cinematic_Frames_Func017C() ) then
        set udg_cin_frame = ( udg_cin_frame + 1 )
        call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Periodic_Cam )
        call PlayMusicBJ( gg_snd_TempleTheme )
        call StartTimerBJ( udg_cin_timer, false, 0.60 )
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Cinematic_Frames_Func018C() ) then
        call ShowInterfaceForceOn( GetPlayersAll(), 0.00 )
        call DialogDisplayBJ( true, udg_info_dialog, udg_player )
        set udg_action_disabled = false
        set udg_cinematic_mode = false
        return
    else
    endif
    // Mur'gul
    if ( Trig_Cinematic_Frames_Func020C() ) then
        set udg_enemy_wiped_door = 3
        set udg_enemy_spawn_type_min = 1
        set udg_enemy_spawn_type_max = 4
        set udg_enemy_spawn_value = 1
        set udg_enemy_spawn_max = 5
        set udg_reg_quad[1] = gg_rct_MurgulQuad01
        set udg_reg_quad[2] = gg_rct_MurgulQuad02
        set udg_reg_quad[3] = gg_rct_MurgulQuad03
        set udg_reg_quad[4] = gg_rct_MurgulQuad04
        set udg_cinematic_mode = true
        set udg_action_disabled = true
        call PauseTimerBJ( true, udg_action_atk_timer )
        call PauseTimerBJ( true, udg_action_swm_timer )
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_Swim_End )
        call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Aim_Periodic )
        call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Periodic_Cam )
        call StopMusicBJ( true )
        call ModifyGateBJ( bj_GATEOPERATION_CLOSE, udg_door_destruct[2] )
        set udg_p[1] = GetDestructableLoc(udg_door_destruct[2])
        call PlaySoundAtPointBJ( udg_door_close_rolling_snd, 100, udg_p[1], 0 )
        call RemoveLocation (udg_p[1])
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( udg_player_character, "stop" )
        set udg_p[1] = GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Cinematic02Murgul)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n001', udg_player_enemy, udg_p[1], 0.00 )
        call SetUnitFlyHeightBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 0.00, 0.00 )
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ( 1.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call SetUnitUserData( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 4 )
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A00C', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call RemoveLocation (udg_p[1])
        set udg_cin_frame = ( udg_cin_frame + 1 )
        call StartTimerBJ( udg_cin_timer, false, 1.00 )
        call ShowInterfaceForceOff( GetPlayersAll(), 0.00 )
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Cinematic_Frames_Func021C() ) then
        set udg_cam_current = gg_cam_Murgul1
        call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer( true, udg_cam_current, udg_player, 1.00 )
        set udg_cin_frame = ( udg_cin_frame + 1 )
        set udg_p[1] = GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Cinematic02ErglMove)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_player_character, "move", udg_p[1] )
        call RemoveLocation (udg_p[1])
        call StartTimerBJ( udg_cin_timer, false, 1.00 )
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Cinematic_Frames_Func022C() ) then
        call PlaySoundBJ( udg_cin_frame_snd )
        call TransmissionFromUnitTypeWithNameBJ( GetPlayersAll(), udg_player, 'n000', "TRIGSTR_335", Location(0, 0), null, "TRIGSTR_336", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 9999.00, true )
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Cinematic_Frames_Func023C() ) then

        call TransmissionFromUnitTypeWithNameBJ( GetPlayersAll(), udg_player_enemy, 'h003', "TRIGSTR_339", Location(0, 0), null, "TRIGSTR_340", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 9999.00, true )
        return

        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Cinematic_Frames_Func037C() ) then
        call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Dragon_Turtle_Legs )
        call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Dragon_Turtle_Attack )
        call PauseTimerBJ( true, udg_boss_turt_spec_timer )
        set udg_boss_turtle = null
        set udg_i[1] = 1
        loop
            exitwhen udg_i[1] > 4
            call RemoveUnit( udg_boss_turt_leg[udg_i[1]] )
            set udg_i[1] = udg_i[1] + 1
        endloop
        set udg_p[1] = GetDestructableLoc(udg_door_destruct[udg_enemy_wiped_door])
        call PlaySoundAtPointBJ( udg_door_close_rolling_snd, 100, udg_p[1], 0 )
        call RemoveLocation (udg_p[1])
        call ModifyGateBJ( bj_GATEOPERATION_OPEN, udg_door_destruct[udg_enemy_wiped_door] )
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_Clear_Projectiles )
        set udg_ug[1] = GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Cinematic_Frames_Func037Func011002002))
        call ForGroupBJ( udg_ug[1], function Trig_Cinematic_Frames_Func037Func012002 )
        call DestroyGroup (udg_ug[1])
        call ClearMapMusicBJ(  )
        call PlayMusicBJ( gg_snd_TempleTheme )
        return
    else
    endif
    // Naga
    if ( Trig_Cinematic_Frames_Func039C() ) then
        call ClearMapMusicBJ(  )
        call StopMusicBJ( false )
        set udg_enemy_wiped_door = 7
        set udg_enemy_spawn_type_min = 6
        set udg_enemy_spawn_type_max = 9
        set udg_enemy_spawn_value = 2
        set udg_enemy_spawn_max = 5
        set udg_reg_quad[1] = gg_rct_NagaQuad01
        set udg_reg_quad[2] = gg_rct_NagaQuad02
        set udg_reg_quad[3] = gg_rct_NagaQuad03
        set udg_reg_quad[4] = gg_rct_NagaQuad04
        call PauseTimerBJ( true, udg_action_atk_timer )
        call PauseTimerBJ( true, udg_action_swm_timer )
        set udg_cinematic_mode = true
        set udg_action_disabled = true

        call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Aim_Periodic )
        call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Periodic_Cam )

        set udg_p[1] = GetDestructableLoc(udg_door_destruct[6])
        call PlaySoundAtPointBJ( udg_door_close_rolling_snd, 100, udg_p[1], 0 )
        call RemoveLocation (udg_p[1])
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( udg_player_character, "stop" )

        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n001', udg_player_enemy, udg_p[1], 180.00 )
        call SetUnitFlyHeightBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 0.00, 0.00 )
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ( 1.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call SetUnitUserData( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 7 )
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A00C', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call RemoveLocation (udg_p[1])
        set udg_p[1] = GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Door06CinNaga02)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n001', udg_player_enemy, udg_p[1], 180.00 )
        call SetUnitFlyHeightBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 0.00, 0.00 )
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ( 1.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call SetUnitUserData( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 9 )
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A00C', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call RemoveLocation (udg_p[1])
        set udg_cin_frame = ( udg_cin_frame + 1 )
        call ShowInterfaceForceOff( GetPlayersAll(), 0.00 )
        call StartTimerBJ( udg_cin_timer, false, 1.00 )
        return
    else
    endif

    if ( Trig_Cinematic_Frames_Func057C() ) then
        call PauseTimerBJ( true, udg_boss_hydra_spec_prep )
        call PauseTimerBJ( true, udg_boss_hydra_spec_timer )
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_Hydra_Special_End )
        call PauseUnitBJ( true, udg_boss_hydra )

        call ClearMapMusicBJ(  )
        call StopMusicBJ( false )

        call SetUnitAnimation( udg_boss_hydra, "spell fourth" )
        call SetUnitFlyHeightBJ( udg_boss_hydra, 2000.00, 100.00 )
        set udg_cinematic_mode = true
        set udg_action_disabled = true
        call PauseTimerBJ( true, udg_action_atk_timer )
        call PauseTimerBJ( true, udg_action_swm_timer )
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_Swim_End )
        call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Aim_Periodic )
        call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Periodic_Cam )
        set udg_cin_frame = ( udg_cin_frame + 1 )
        call StartTimerBJ( udg_cin_timer, false, 3.00 )
        call ShowInterfaceForceOff( GetPlayersAll(), 0.00 )
        call CinematicFadeBJ( bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEOUT, 2, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\Black_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0 )
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Cinematic_Frames_Func058C() ) then
        call RemoveUnit( udg_boss_hydra )

        call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Periodic_Cam )
        set udg_cam_current = gg_cam_Temple_Ending
        call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer( true, udg_cam_current, udg_player, 0.00 )
        set udg_p[1] = GetRectCenter(gg_rct_SeaWitch)
        call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ( udg_player_character, udg_p[1], 0.00 )
        call RemoveLocation (udg_p[1])
        set udg_p[1] = GetRectCenter(gg_rct_EndingMurgul1a)
        set udg_p[2] = GetRectCenter(gg_rct_EndingMurgul1b)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, udg_enemy_type[1], Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), udg_p[1], bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_p[2] )
        call RemoveLocation (udg_p[1])
        call RemoveLocation (udg_p[2])
        set udg_p[1] = GetRectCenter(gg_rct_EndingMurgul2a)
        set udg_p[2] = GetRectCenter(gg_rct_EndingMurgul2b)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, udg_enemy_type[2], Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), udg_p[1], bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_p[2] )
        call RemoveLocation (udg_p[1])
        call RemoveLocation (udg_p[2])
        set udg_p[1] = GetRectCenter(gg_rct_EndingMurgul3a)
        set udg_p[2] = GetRectCenter(gg_rct_EndingMurgul3b)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, udg_enemy_type[3], Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), udg_p[1], bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_p[2] )
        call RemoveLocation (udg_p[1])
        call RemoveLocation (udg_p[2])
        set udg_p[1] = GetRectCenter(gg_rct_EndingMurgul4a)
        set udg_p[2] = GetRectCenter(gg_rct_EndingMurgul4b)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, udg_enemy_type[4], Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), udg_p[1], bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_p[2] )
        call RemoveLocation (udg_p[1])
        call RemoveLocation (udg_p[2])
        set udg_cin_frame = ( udg_cin_frame + 1 )
        call StartTimerBJ( udg_cin_timer, false, 2.00 )
        return
    else
    endif

        call CinematicFadeBJ( bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEOUT, 2, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\Black_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0 )

        return
