    // Village Ending
    if ( Trig_Cinematic_Frames_Func065C() ) then
        call ForceUICancelBJ( udg_player )
        call ClearMapMusicBJ(  )
        call PlayMusicBJ( gg_snd_VillageTheme )
        call CinematicFadeBJ( bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEIN, 2, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\Black_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0 )
        call SetSkyModel( "Environment\\Sky\\LordaeronSummerSky\\LordaeronSummerSky.mdl" )
        call SetDayNightModels("Environment\\DNC\\DNCDalaran\\DNCDalaranTerrain\\DNCDalaranTerrain.mdl" , "Environment\\DNC\\DNCDalaran\\DNCDalaranUnit\\DNCDalaranUnit.mdl")
        set udg_fog_R = 255.00
        set udg_fog_B = 255.00
        set udg_fog_G = 255.00
        set udg_fog_Z = 10000.00
        call SetTerrainFogExBJ( 0, 0.00, udg_fog_Z, 0, ( udg_fog_R / 2.55 ), ( udg_fog_G / 2.55 ), ( udg_fog_B / 2.55 ) )
        set udg_p[1] = GetRectCenter(gg_rct_ErglReturn1)
        call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ( gg_unit_n000_0024, udg_p[1], 310.00 )
        call RemoveLocation (udg_p[1])
        set udg_p[1] = GetRectCenter(gg_rct_ErglReturn2)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( gg_unit_n000_0024, "move", udg_p[1] )
        call RemoveLocation (udg_p[1])
        set udg_cam_current = gg_cam_Village_Ending1
        call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer( true, udg_cam_current, udg_player, 0.00 )
        set udg_cin_frame = ( udg_cin_frame + 1 )
        call StartTimerBJ( udg_cin_timer, false, 2.00 )
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Cinematic_Frames_Func066C() ) then
        call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ( GetPlayersAll(), gg_unit_nmfs_0022, "TRIGSTR_425", null, "TRIGSTR_426", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 9999.00, true )
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Cinematic_Frames_Func067C() ) then
        call TransmissionFromUnitTypeWithNameBJ( GetPlayersAll(), udg_player, 'n000', "TRIGSTR_427", Location(0, 0), null, "TRIGSTR_428", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 9999.00, true )
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Cinematic_Frames_Func068C() ) then
        call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ( GetPlayersAll(), gg_unit_nmfs_0022, "TRIGSTR_437", null, "TRIGSTR_438", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 9999.00, true )
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Cinematic_Frames_Func069C() ) then
        call TransmissionFromUnitTypeWithNameBJ( GetPlayersAll(), udg_player, 'n000', "TRIGSTR_439", Location(0, 0), null, "TRIGSTR_440", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 9999.00, true )
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Cinematic_Frames_Func070C() ) then
        call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ( GetPlayersAll(), gg_unit_nmfs_0022, "TRIGSTR_441", null, "TRIGSTR_442", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 9999.00, true )
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Cinematic_Frames_Func071C() ) then
        set udg_cam_current = gg_cam_Village_Ending2
        call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer( true, udg_cam_current, udg_player, 5.00 )
        call ForceUICancelBJ( udg_player )
        set udg_cin_frame = ( udg_cin_frame + 1 )
        call StartTimerBJ( udg_cin_timer, false, 5.00 )
        set bj_forLoopAIndex = 1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd = 10
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            set udg_p[1] = GetRectCenter(udg_murg_return_reg_a[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            set udg_p[2] = GetRectCenter(udg_murg_return_reg_b[GetForLoopIndexA()])
            set udg_i[1] = GetRandomInt(1, 4)
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, udg_enemy_type[udg_i[1]], Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), udg_p[1], 310.00 )
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", udg_p[2] )
            call RemoveLocation (udg_p[1])
            call RemoveLocation (udg_p[2])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex = bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Cinematic_Frames_Func072C() ) then
        call ClearMapMusicBJ(  )
        call StopMusicBJ( false )
        call PlaySoundBJ( udg_cin_frame_snd )
        set udg_ug[1] = GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_ReturnMurguls)
        call ForGroupBJ( udg_ug[1], function Trig_Cinematic_Frames_Func072Func005002 )
        call DestroyGroup (udg_ug[1])
        call SetSoundPitchBJ( gg_snd_ErglHuh, 0.80 )
        set udg_p[1] = GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_nmfs_0022)
        call PlaySoundAtPointBJ( gg_snd_ErglHuh, 50.00, udg_p[1], 0 )
        call RemoveLocation (udg_p[1])
        call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ( GetPlayersAll(), gg_unit_nmfs_0022, "TRIGSTR_445", null, "TRIGSTR_446", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 9999.00, true )
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Cinematic_Frames_Func073C() ) then
        call CinematicFadeBJ( bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEOUT, 1.00, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\Black_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0 )
        set udg_cin_frame = ( udg_cin_frame + 1 )
        call StartTimerBJ( udg_cin_timer, false, 1.00 )
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Cinematic_Frames_Func074C() ) then
        call CinematicFadeBJ( bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEIN, 1.00, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\Black_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0 )
        call PlayMusicBJ( gg_snd_CreditsTheme )
        call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer( true, gg_cam_Credits1, udg_player, 0 )
        call TransmissionFromUnitTypeWithNameBJ( GetPlayersAll(), Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), 'h003', "TRIGSTR_453", Location(0, 0), null, "TRIGSTR_454", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 9999.00, true )
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Cinematic_Frames_Func075C() ) then
        call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer( true, gg_cam_Credits2, udg_player, 0 )
        call TransmissionFromUnitTypeWithNameBJ( GetPlayersAll(), Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), 'h000', "TRIGSTR_451", Location(0, 0), null, "TRIGSTR_452", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 9999.00, true )
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Cinematic_Frames_Func076C() ) then
        call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer( true, gg_cam_Credits3, udg_player, 0 )
        call TransmissionFromUnitTypeWithNameBJ( GetPlayersAll(), Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), 'h002', "TRIGSTR_455", Location(0, 0), null, "TRIGSTR_456", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 9999.00, true )
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Cinematic_Frames_Func077C() ) then
        call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer( true, gg_cam_Credits4, udg_player, 0 )
        call TransmissionFromUnitTypeWithNameBJ( GetPlayersAll(), Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), 'h001', "TRIGSTR_457", Location(0, 0), null, "TRIGSTR_458", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 9999.00, true )
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Cinematic_Frames_Func078C() ) then
        call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer( true, gg_cam_Credits5, udg_player, 0 )
        call TransmissionFromUnitTypeWithNameBJ( GetPlayersAll(), Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), 'nmrr', "TRIGSTR_459", Location(0, 0), null, "TRIGSTR_460", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 9999.00, true )
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Cinematic_Frames_Func079C() ) then
        call ForceUICancelBJ( udg_player )
        call CinematicFadeBJ( bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEOUT, 2.00, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\Black_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0 )
        call DisplayTextToForce( GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_463" )
        set udg_cin_frame = ( udg_cin_frame + 1 )
        call TriggerSleepAction( 5.00 )
        call CustomVictoryBJ( udg_player, false, false )
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Cinematic_Frames takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Cinematic_Frames = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ( gg_trg_Cinematic_Frames, udg_cin_timer )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Cinematic_Frames, function Trig_Cinematic_Frames_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Door 01 Cinematic
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Door_01_Cinematic_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_player_character ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Door_01_Cinematic_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger( GetTriggeringTrigger() )
    call ModifyGateBJ( bj_GATEOPERATION_CLOSE, udg_door_destruct[1] )
    set udg_p[1] = GetDestructableLoc(udg_door_destruct[1])
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ( udg_door_close_rolling_snd, 100, udg_p[1], 0 )
    call RemoveLocation (udg_p[1])
    call AddUnitAnimationPropertiesBJ( false, "alternate", udg_player_character )
    call StartTimerBJ( udg_cin_timer, false, 1.50 )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Door_01_Cinematic takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Door_01_Cinematic = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_Door_01_Cinematic, gg_rct_DoorRegion01Close )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Door_01_Cinematic, Condition( function Trig_Door_01_Cinematic_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Door_01_Cinematic, function Trig_Door_01_Cinematic_Actions )
endfunction

    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_player_character ) ) then

//===========================================================================

    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_player_character ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    call ModifyGateBJ( bj_GATEOPERATION_CLOSE, udg_door_destruct[2] )
    call PlayMusicBJ( gg_snd_BattleTheme )
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_Spawn_Enemies )
endfunction

    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Door_02_NonCinematic, function Trig_Door_02_NonCinematic_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Door 02 Murgul
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Door_02_Murgul_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != 'n001' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Door_02_Murgul_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger( GetTriggeringTrigger() )
    set udg_murgul = GetTriggerUnit()
    call PauseUnitBJ( true, udg_murgul )
endfunction

    set gg_trg_Door_02_Murgul = CreateTrigger(  )

endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Door 04 NonCinematic
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Door_04_NonCinematic_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_player_character ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Door_04_NonCinematic_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger( GetTriggeringTrigger() )
    call ModifyGateBJ( bj_GATEOPERATION_CLOSE, udg_door_destruct[4] )
    set udg_p[1] = GetDestructableLoc(udg_door_destruct[4])
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ( udg_door_close_rolling_snd, 100, udg_p[1], 0 )
    call RemoveLocation (udg_p[1])
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_Turtle_Setup )
    call PauseUnitBJ( false, udg_boss_turtle )
    call ClearMapMusicBJ(  )
    call PlayMusicBJ( gg_snd_BossTurtleTheme )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Door_04_NonCinematic takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Door_04_NonCinematic = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Door_04_NonCinematic )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_Door_04_NonCinematic, gg_rct_Door04CinStart )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Door_04_NonCinematic, Condition( function Trig_Door_04_NonCinematic_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Door_04_NonCinematic, function Trig_Door_04_NonCinematic_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Door 04 Notice Turtle
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Door_04_Notice_Turtle_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_player_character ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Door_04_Notice_Turtle_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger( GetTriggeringTrigger() )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Turtle_Door_Close )
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( udg_player_character, "stop" )
    set udg_p[1] = GetUnitLoc(udg_boss_turtle)
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ( gg_snd_TurtleGrunt01, 100, udg_p[1], 200.00 )
    call RemoveLocation (udg_p[1])
    set udg_cin_frame = ( udg_cin_frame + 1 )
    call StartTimerBJ( udg_cin_timer, false, 1.00 )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Door_04_Notice_Turtle takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Door_04_Notice_Turtle = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_Door_04_Notice_Turtle, gg_rct_Door04ErglMoveA )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Door_04_Notice_Turtle, Condition( function Trig_Door_04_Notice_Turtle_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Door_04_Notice_Turtle, function Trig_Door_04_Notice_Turtle_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Turtle Door Close
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Turtle_Door_Close_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_player_character ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Turtle_Door_Close_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger( GetTriggeringTrigger() )
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( udg_player_character, "stop" )
    call ModifyGateBJ( bj_GATEOPERATION_CLOSE, udg_door_destruct[4] )
    set udg_p[1] = GetDestructableLoc(udg_door_destruct[4])
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ( udg_door_close_rolling_snd, 100, udg_p[1], 0 )
    call RemoveLocation (udg_p[1])
    set udg_cin_frame = ( udg_cin_frame + 1 )
    call StartTimerBJ( udg_cin_timer, false, 1.00 )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Turtle_Door_Close takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Turtle_Door_Close = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Turtle_Door_Close )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_Turtle_Door_Close, gg_rct_Door04ErglMoveB )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Turtle_Door_Close, Condition( function Trig_Turtle_Door_Close_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Turtle_Door_Close, function Trig_Turtle_Door_Close_Actions )
endfunction

    set udg_cin_frame = ( udg_cin_frame + 1 )

    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_Door_08_Cinematic, gg_rct_Door08CinStart )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Door_08_Cinematic, Condition( function Trig_Door_08_Cinematic_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Door_08_Cinematic, function Trig_Door_08_Cinematic_Actions )

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Door 08 NonCinematic
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Door_08_NonCinematic_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_player_character ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Door_08_NonCinematic_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger( GetTriggeringTrigger() )
    call ModifyGateBJ( bj_GATEOPERATION_CLOSE, udg_door_destruct[8] )
    set udg_boss_wtch_vuln = true
    call PlayMusicBJ( gg_snd_BossWitchHydraTheme )
    call PauseUnitBJ( false, udg_boss_hydra )
    call PauseUnitBJ( false, udg_boss_wtch )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Door_08_NonCinematic takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Door_08_NonCinematic = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Door_08_NonCinematic )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_Door_08_NonCinematic, gg_rct_Door08CinStart )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Door_08_NonCinematic, Condition( function Trig_Door_08_NonCinematic_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Door_08_NonCinematic, function Trig_Door_08_NonCinematic_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Face Witch
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Face_Witch_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_player_character ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Face_Witch_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger( GetTriggeringTrigger() )
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( udg_player_character, "stop" )
    call SetUnitFacingToFaceUnitTimed( udg_player_character, udg_boss_wtch, 0 )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Face_Witch takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Face_Witch = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_Face_Witch, gg_rct_CinematicBossWitchErglMove )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Face_Witch, Condition( function Trig_Face_Witch_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Face_Witch, function Trig_Face_Witch_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Periodic Runes
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Periodic_Runes_Func001Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetFilterUnit() == udg_player_character )
endfunction

function Trig_Periodic_Runes_Func001Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_ug[1]) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Periodic_Runes_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_u[1] = GetEnumUnit()
    set udg_p[1] = GetUnitLoc(udg_u[1])
    set udg_ug[1] = GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(udg_rune_range, udg_p[1], Condition(function Trig_Periodic_Runes_Func001Func003002003))
    if ( Trig_Periodic_Runes_Func001Func004C() ) then
        call KillUnit( udg_u[1] )
        call SetUnitLifeBJ( udg_player_character, ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, udg_player_character) + udg_rune_heal ) )
    else
    endif
    call DestroyGroup (udg_ug[1])
    call RemoveLocation (udg_p[1])
endfunction

function Trig_Periodic_Runes_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ( udg_rune_group, function Trig_Periodic_Runes_Func001A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Periodic_Runes takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Periodic_Runes = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Periodic_Runes )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_Periodic_Runes, 0.10 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Periodic_Runes, function Trig_Periodic_Runes_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Mouse Move
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Mouse_Move_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveLocation (udg_mouse_point)
    set udg_mouse_point = BlzGetTriggerPlayerMousePosition()
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Mouse_Move takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Mouse_Move = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Mouse_Move, function Trig_Mouse_Move_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Mouse Press
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Mouse_Press_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_action_aiming == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_action_disabled == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_cinematic_mode == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Mouse_Press_Func001Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( udg_mouse_pressed_L == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( BlzGetTriggerPlayerMouseButton() == MOUSE_BUTTON_TYPE_LEFT ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Mouse_Press_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Mouse_Press_Func001Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Mouse_Press_Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( udg_mouse_pressed_R == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( BlzGetTriggerPlayerMouseButton() == MOUSE_BUTTON_TYPE_RIGHT ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Mouse_Press_Func002Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_cinematic_mode == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_action_disabled == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Mouse_Press_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Mouse_Press_Func002Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Mouse_Press_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Mouse_Press_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_mouse_pressed_L = true
        if ( Trig_Mouse_Press_Func001Func002C() ) then
            set udg_action_disabled = true
            set udg_p[1] = GetUnitLoc(udg_player_character)
            set udg_action_angle = AngleBetweenPoints(udg_p[1], udg_mouse_point)
            set udg_p[2] = PolarProjectionBJ(udg_p[1], 50.00, udg_action_angle)
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n001', Player(0), udg_p[2], udg_action_angle )
            set udg_action_aim_lock = GetLastCreatedUnit()
            call SetUnitLookAt( udg_player_character, "bone_chest", udg_action_aim_lock, 0, 0, 0.00 )
            call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( udg_player_character, "stop" )
            call SetUnitFacingTimed( udg_player_character, udg_action_angle, 0 )
            call SetUnitTimeScalePercent( udg_player_character, 200.00 )
            set udg_i[1] = 19
            call SetUnitAnimationByIndex(udg_player_character, udg_i[1])
            call RemoveLocation (udg_p[1])
            call RemoveLocation (udg_p[2])
            call StartTimerBJ( udg_action_atk_timer, false, 0.40 )
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Mouse_Press_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_mouse_pressed_R = true
        if ( Trig_Mouse_Press_Func002Func003C() ) then
            set udg_action_swm_charge = 0.70
            set udg_action_aiming = true
            call StartTimerBJ( udg_action_swm_timer, false, 0.30 )
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Mouse_Press takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Mouse_Press = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Mouse_Press, function Trig_Mouse_Press_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Mouse Release
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Mouse_Release_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( BlzGetTriggerPlayerMouseButton() == MOUSE_BUTTON_TYPE_LEFT ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Mouse_Release_Func002Func003Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_action_swm_active == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Mouse_Release_Func002Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_action_disabled == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_cinematic_mode == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Mouse_Release_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( BlzGetTriggerPlayerMouseButton() == MOUSE_BUTTON_TYPE_RIGHT ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Mouse_Release_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Mouse_Release_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_mouse_pressed_L = false
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Mouse_Release_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_mouse_pressed_R = false
        set udg_action_aiming = false
        if ( Trig_Mouse_Release_Func002Func003C() ) then
            if ( Trig_Mouse_Release_Func002Func003Func001C() ) then
                call RemoveUnit( udg_action_aim_lock )
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_player_character, "move", udg_mouse_point )
                call PauseTimerBJ( true, udg_action_swm_timer )
                set udg_action_aiming = false
                set udg_action_disabled = false
            else
                set udg_action_disabled = true
                call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Aim_Periodic )
                set udg_action_swm_active = false
                set udg_p[1] = GetUnitLoc(udg_player_character)
                set udg_i[1] = GetRandomInt(1, 2)
                call StopSoundBJ( udg_action_atk_snd[udg_i[1]], false )
                call PlaySoundAtPointBJ( udg_action_swm_snd[udg_i[1]], 50.00, udg_p[1], 0 )
                set udg_action_angle = AngleBetweenPoints(udg_p[1], udg_mouse_point)
                call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A001', udg_player_character )
                call SetUnitFlyHeightBJ( udg_player_character, 40.00, 80.00 )
                call ResetUnitAnimation( udg_player_character )
                set udg_i[1] = 7
                call SetUnitAnimationByIndex(udg_player_character, udg_i[1])
                set udg_player_swm_invul = true
                call StartTimerBJ( udg_action_swm_inv_timer, false, 0.15 )
                call StartTimerBJ( udg_action_swm_end_timer, false, 0.30 )
                call RemoveLocation (udg_p[1])
                call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Swim_Periodic )
            endif
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Mouse_Release takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Mouse_Release = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Mouse_Release, function Trig_Mouse_Release_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Attack End
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Attack_End_Func020C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_player_character != null ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Attack_End_Func021Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_mouse_pressed_R == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_mouse_pressed_L == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Attack_End_Func021Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_mouse_pressed_R == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_mouse_pressed_L == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Attack_End_Func021Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( Trig_Attack_End_Func021Func002Func001C() ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( Trig_Attack_End_Func021Func002Func002C() ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Attack_End_Func021C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_action_disabled == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Attack_End_Func021Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Attack_End_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ResetUnitLookAt( udg_player_character )
    call RemoveUnit( udg_action_aim_lock )
    set udg_action_aim_lock = null
    call ResetUnitAnimation( udg_player_character )
    set udg_p[1] = GetUnitLoc(udg_player_character)
    set udg_p[2] = PolarProjectionBJ(udg_p[1], udg_projectile_area[0], udg_action_angle)
    call SetUnitTimeScalePercent( udg_player_character, 100 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n001', udg_player, udg_p[2], udg_action_angle )
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ( udg_projectile_expiration[0], 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( udg_projectile_type[0], GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call SetUnitUserData( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 0 )
    call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_projectile_group )
    call SetUnitScalePercent( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_projectile_size[0], udg_projectile_size[0], udg_projectile_size[0] )
    set udg_i[1] = GetRandomInt(1, 3)
    call StopSoundBJ( udg_action_atk_snd[udg_i[1]], false )
    call PlaySoundAtPointBJ( udg_action_atk_snd[udg_i[1]], 50.00, udg_p[1], 0 )
    call RemoveLocation (udg_p[1])
    call RemoveLocation (udg_p[2])
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Periodic_Projectiles )
    if ( Trig_Attack_End_Func020C() ) then
        set udg_action_disabled = false
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Attack_End_Func021C() ) then
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_Mouse_Press )
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Attack_End takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Attack_End = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ( gg_trg_Attack_End, udg_action_atk_timer )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Attack_End, function Trig_Attack_End_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Periodic Projectiles
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Periodic_Projectiles_Func002Func001Func004Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(udg_u[1], GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit())) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Periodic_Projectiles_Func002Func001Func004Func004Func002Func002Func001Func001Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_u[2] == udg_player_character ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_player_swm_invul == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Periodic_Projectiles_Func002Func001Func004Func004Func002Func002Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( udg_u[2] != udg_player_character ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( Trig_Periodic_Projectiles_Func002Func001Func004Func004Func002Func002Func001Func001Func001Func002C() ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Periodic_Projectiles_Func002Func001Func004Func004Func002Func002Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Periodic_Projectiles_Func002Func001Func004Func004Func002Func002Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitUserData(udg_u[1]) < 100 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Periodic_Projectiles_Func002Func001Func004Func004Func002Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(udg_u[2], UNIT_TYPE_MECHANICAL) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Periodic_Projectiles_Func002Func001Func004Func004Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_u[2]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(udg_u[2]) != 'n001' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(udg_u[2], UNIT_TYPE_ANCIENT) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Periodic_Projectiles_Func002Func001Func004Func004Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_u[2] = GetEnumUnit()
    if ( Trig_Periodic_Projectiles_Func002Func001Func004Func004Func002Func002C() ) then
        if ( Trig_Periodic_Projectiles_Func002Func001Func004Func004Func002Func002Func001C() ) then
            if ( Trig_Periodic_Projectiles_Func002Func001Func004Func004Func002Func002Func001Func001C() ) then
                set udg_i[2] = ( udg_i[2] + 1 )
            else
            endif
            call UnitDamageTargetBJ( udg_u[1], GetEnumUnit(), ( ( 0.25 * I2R(udg_rage) ) + udg_projectile_damage[GetUnitUserData(udg_u[1])] ), ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL )
        else
            call UnitDamageTargetBJ( udg_u[1], GetEnumUnit(), 0.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL )
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Periodic_Projectiles_Func002Func001Func004Func004Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_i[2] > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Periodic_Projectiles_Func002Func001Func004Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_ug[1]) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Periodic_Projectiles_Func002Func001Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsTerrainPathableBJ(udg_p[2], PATHING_TYPE_FLYABILITY) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Periodic_Projectiles_Func002Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_u[1] = GetEnumUnit()
    set udg_p[1] = GetUnitLoc(udg_u[1])
    set udg_p[2] = PolarProjectionBJ(udg_p[1], udg_projectile_speed[GetUnitUserData(udg_u[1])], GetUnitFacing(udg_u[1]))
    if ( Trig_Periodic_Projectiles_Func002Func001Func004C() ) then
        call SetUnitPositionLoc( udg_u[1], udg_p[2] )
        set udg_ug[1] = GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(udg_projectile_area[GetUnitUserData(udg_u[1])], udg_p[2], Condition(function Trig_Periodic_Projectiles_Func002Func001Func004Func003002003))
        if ( Trig_Periodic_Projectiles_Func002Func001Func004Func004C() ) then
            set udg_i[2] = 0
            call ForGroupBJ( udg_ug[1], function Trig_Periodic_Projectiles_Func002Func001Func004Func004Func002A )
            if ( Trig_Periodic_Projectiles_Func002Func001Func004Func004Func003C() ) then
                call KillUnit( udg_u[1] )
            else
            endif
        else
        endif
    else
        call KillUnit( udg_u[1] )
    endif
    call DestroyGroup (udg_ug[1])
    call RemoveLocation (udg_p[1])
    call RemoveLocation (udg_p[2])
endfunction

function Trig_Periodic_Projectiles_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_projectile_group) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Periodic_Projectiles_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Periodic_Projectiles_Func002C() ) then
        call ForGroupBJ( udg_projectile_group, function Trig_Periodic_Projectiles_Func002Func001A )
    else
        call DisableTrigger( GetTriggeringTrigger() )
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Periodic_Projectiles takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Periodic_Projectiles = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Periodic_Projectiles )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_Periodic_Projectiles, 0.03 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Periodic_Projectiles, function Trig_Periodic_Projectiles_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Aim Periodic
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Aim_Periodic_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_action_swm_charge < 2.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Aim_Periodic_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_action_aim_lock != null ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Aim_Periodic_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Aim_Periodic_Func001C() ) then
        if ( Trig_Aim_Periodic_Func001Func001C() ) then
            set udg_action_swm_charge = ( udg_action_swm_charge + 0.02 )
            call ClearTextMessagesBJ( GetPlayersAll() )
        else
        endif
        set udg_p[1] = GetUnitLoc(udg_player_character)
        set udg_r[1] = AngleBetweenPoints(udg_p[1], udg_mouse_point)
        set udg_p[2] = PolarProjectionBJ(udg_p[1], 50.00, udg_r[1])
        call SetUnitPositionLoc( udg_action_aim_lock, udg_p[2] )
        call RemoveLocation (udg_p[1])
        call RemoveLocation (udg_p[2])
    else
        call ResetUnitLookAt( udg_player_character )
        call DisableTrigger( GetTriggeringTrigger() )
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Aim_Periodic takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Aim_Periodic = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Aim_Periodic )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_Aim_Periodic, 0.03 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Aim_Periodic, function Trig_Aim_Periodic_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Swim Enable
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Swim_Enable_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_action_swm_active = true
    set udg_p[1] = GetUnitLoc(udg_player_character)
    set udg_r[1] = AngleBetweenPoints(udg_p[1], udg_mouse_point)
    set udg_p[2] = PolarProjectionBJ(udg_p[1], 50.00, udg_r[1])
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n001', Player(0), udg_p[2], udg_r[1] )
    set udg_action_aim_lock = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call SetUnitLookAt( udg_player_character, "bone_chest", udg_action_aim_lock, 0, 0, 0.00 )
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( udg_player_character, "stop" )
    set udg_i[1] = 16
    call SetUnitAnimationByIndex(udg_player_character, udg_i[1])
    call RemoveLocation (udg_p[1])
    call RemoveLocation (udg_p[2])
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Aim_Periodic )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Swim_Enable takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Swim_Enable = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ( gg_trg_Swim_Enable, udg_action_swm_timer )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Swim_Enable, function Trig_Swim_Enable_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Swim Periodic
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Swim_Periodic_Func001Func006Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( RectContainsLoc(udg_door_region[GetForLoopIndexA()], udg_p[2]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsDestructableAliveBJ(udg_door_destruct[GetForLoopIndexA()]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Swim_Periodic_Func001Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsTerrainPathableBJ(udg_p[2], PATHING_TYPE_WALKABILITY) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_i[0] == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Swim_Periodic_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_action_aim_lock != null ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Swim_Periodic_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Swim_Periodic_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_p[1] = GetUnitLoc(udg_player_character)
        set udg_p[2] = PolarProjectionBJ(udg_p[1], ( udg_action_swm_charge * udg_action_swm_speed ), udg_action_angle)
        set udg_p[3] = PolarProjectionBJ(udg_p[1], ( ( udg_action_swm_charge * udg_action_swm_speed ) + 50.00 ), udg_action_angle)
        set udg_i[0] = 0
        set bj_forLoopAIndex = 1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd = 8
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            if ( Trig_Swim_Periodic_Func001Func006Func001C() ) then
                set udg_i[0] = 1
            else
            endif
            set bj_forLoopAIndex = bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        if ( Trig_Swim_Periodic_Func001Func007C() ) then
            call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ( udg_action_aim_lock, udg_p[3], udg_action_angle )
            call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ( udg_player_character, udg_p[2], udg_action_angle )
        else
            call RemoveUnit( udg_action_aim_lock )
            set udg_action_aim_lock = null
            call StartTimerBJ( udg_action_swm_end_timer, false, 0.00 )
        endif
        call RemoveLocation (udg_p[1])
        call RemoveLocation (udg_p[2])
        call RemoveLocation (udg_p[3])
    else
        call DisableTrigger( GetTriggeringTrigger() )
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Swim_Periodic takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Swim_Periodic = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Swim_Periodic )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_Swim_Periodic, 0.03 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Swim_Periodic, function Trig_Swim_Periodic_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Swim Vulnerable
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Swim_Vulnerable_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_player_swm_invul = false
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Swim_Vulnerable takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Swim_Vulnerable = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ( gg_trg_Swim_Vulnerable, udg_action_swm_inv_timer )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Swim_Vulnerable, function Trig_Swim_Vulnerable_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Swim End
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Swim_End_Func009C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_cinematic_mode == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_player_character != null ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Swim_End_Func010Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( udg_mouse_pressed_R == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( udg_mouse_pressed_L == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Swim_End_Func010C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_action_disabled == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Swim_End_Func010Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Swim_End_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Swim_Periodic )
    call PauseTimerBJ( true, udg_action_swm_end_timer )
    call RemoveUnit( udg_action_aim_lock )
    set udg_action_aim_lock = null
    call SetUnitFlyHeightBJ( udg_player_character, 0.00, 160.00 )
    call ResetUnitLookAt( udg_player_character )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A001', udg_player_character )
    call ResetUnitAnimation( udg_player_character )
    if ( Trig_Swim_End_Func009C() ) then
        set udg_action_disabled = false
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Swim_End_Func010C() ) then
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_Mouse_Press )
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Swim_End takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Swim_End = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ( gg_trg_Swim_End, udg_action_swm_end_timer )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Swim_End, function Trig_Swim_End_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Sea Witch Swim Periodic
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Sea_Witch_Swim_Periodic_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsTerrainPathableBJ(udg_p[2], PATHING_TYPE_WALKABILITY) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sea_Witch_Swim_Periodic_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_p[1] = GetUnitLoc(udg_boss_wtch)
    set udg_p[2] = PolarProjectionBJ(udg_p[1], udg_boss_wtch_swm_spd, udg_boss_wtch_swm_angle)
    if ( Trig_Sea_Witch_Swim_Periodic_Func003C() ) then
        call SetUnitPositionLoc( udg_boss_wtch, udg_p[2] )
    else
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A00L', udg_boss_wtch )
        call DisableTrigger( GetTriggeringTrigger() )
    endif
    call RemoveLocation (udg_p[1])
    call RemoveLocation (udg_p[2])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Sea_Witch_Swim_Periodic takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Sea_Witch_Swim_Periodic = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Sea_Witch_Swim_Periodic )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_Sea_Witch_Swim_Periodic, 0.03 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Sea_Witch_Swim_Periodic, function Trig_Sea_Witch_Swim_Periodic_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Sea Witch Swim Timer
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Sea_Witch_Swim_Timer_Func002Func011Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsTerrainPathableBJ(udg_p[3], PATHING_TYPE_WALKABILITY) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sea_Witch_Swim_Timer_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_i[udg_boss_wtch_swm_inc] > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sea_Witch_Swim_Timer_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A00L', udg_boss_wtch )
    if ( Trig_Sea_Witch_Swim_Timer_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_boss_wtch_swm_inc = ( udg_boss_wtch_swm_inc - 1 )
        set udg_p[1] = GetUnitLoc(udg_player_character)
        set udg_p[2] = GetUnitLoc(udg_boss_wtch)
        set udg_i[1] = GetRandomInt(1, 2)
        call StopSoundBJ( udg_action_swm_snd[udg_i[1]], false )
        call PlaySoundAtPointBJ( udg_action_swm_snd[udg_i[1]], 50.00, udg_p[2], 0 )
        set udg_r[1] = AngleBetweenPoints(udg_p[1], udg_p[2])
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A00L', udg_boss_wtch )
        set bj_forLoopAIndex = 1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd = 10
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            set udg_r[2] = GetRandomDirectionDeg()
            set udg_p[3] = PolarProjectionBJ(udg_p[2], ( udg_boss_wtch_swm_duration * udg_boss_wtch_swm_duration ), udg_r[2])
            if ( Trig_Sea_Witch_Swim_Timer_Func002Func011Func003C() ) then
                set udg_r[3] = udg_r[2]
            else
            endif
            call RemoveLocation (udg_p[3])
            set bj_forLoopAIndex = bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        set udg_boss_wtch_swm_angle = ( udg_r[1] + udg_r[3] )
        call RemoveLocation (udg_p[1])
        call RemoveLocation (udg_p[2])
        call StartTimerBJ( udg_boss_wtch_swm_timer, false, udg_boss_wtch_swm_duration )
        call StartTimerBJ( udg_boss_wtch_swm_cd_timer, false, GetRandomReal(udg_boss_wtch_swm_cd_min, udg_boss_wtch_swm_cd_max) )
    else
        call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Sea_Witch_Swim_Periodic )
        call StartTimerBJ( udg_boss_wtch_swm_cd_timer, false, GetRandomReal(udg_boss_wtch_swm_cd_min, udg_boss_wtch_swm_cd_max) )
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Sea_Witch_Swim_Timer takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Sea_Witch_Swim_Timer = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ( gg_trg_Sea_Witch_Swim_Timer, udg_boss_wtch_swm_timer )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Sea_Witch_Swim_Timer, function Trig_Sea_Witch_Swim_Timer_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Sea Witch Swim Ready
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Sea_Witch_Swim_Ready_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_boss_wtch_swm_ready = true
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Sea_Witch_Swim_Ready takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Sea_Witch_Swim_Ready = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ( gg_trg_Sea_Witch_Swim_Ready, udg_boss_wtch_swm_cd_timer )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Sea_Witch_Swim_Ready, function Trig_Sea_Witch_Swim_Ready_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Hydra Attack
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Hydra_Attack_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == udg_enemy_type[13] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hydra_Attack_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitLifePercent(udg_boss_wtch) > 75.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hydra_Attack_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_boss_hydra_spec_ready == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_i[3] == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hydra_Attack_Func009C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_i[3] == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hydra_Attack_Func011C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_i[3] == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hydra_Attack_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_u[1] = GetAttacker()
    set udg_p[0] = GetUnitLoc(udg_u[1])
    set udg_p[100] = GetUnitLoc(udg_player_character)
    if ( Trig_Hydra_Attack_Func005C() ) then
        set udg_i[3] = GetRandomInt(1, 2)
    else
        set udg_i[3] = GetRandomInt(1, 3)
    endif
    // Special
    if ( Trig_Hydra_Attack_Func007C() ) then
        set udg_boss_hydra_spec_ready = false
        call PauseUnitBJ( true, udg_boss_hydra )
        call SetUnitAnimation( udg_boss_hydra, "spell second" )
        call StartTimerBJ( udg_boss_hydra_spec_prep, false, 1.58 )
        call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Hydra_Fog_Darken )
    else
        set udg_i[3] = GetRandomInt(1, 2)
    endif
    // Attack 1
    if ( Trig_Hydra_Attack_Func009C() ) then
        set udg_i[2] = 13
        set udg_i[1] = 1
        loop
            exitwhen udg_i[1] > 7
            set udg_r[1] = ( AngleBetweenPoints(udg_p[0], udg_p[100]) + ( ( I2R(udg_i[1]) * 4.00 ) - 14.00 ) )
            set udg_p[udg_i[1]] = PolarProjectionBJ(udg_p[0], ( 5.00 * udg_projectile_area[udg_i[2]] ), udg_r[1])
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n001', GetOwningPlayer(udg_u[1]), udg_p[udg_i[1]], udg_r[1] )
            call RemoveLocation (udg_p[udg_i[1]])
            call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_Create_Projectiles )
            set udg_i[1] = udg_i[1] + 1
        endloop
        set udg_i[2] = 14
        set udg_i[1] = 1
        loop
            exitwhen udg_i[1] > 7
            set udg_r[1] = ( AngleBetweenPoints(udg_p[0], udg_p[100]) + ( ( I2R(udg_i[1]) * 4.00 ) - 14.00 ) )
            set udg_p[udg_i[1]] = PolarProjectionBJ(udg_p[0], ( 5.00 * udg_projectile_area[udg_i[2]] ), udg_r[1])
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n001', GetOwningPlayer(udg_u[1]), udg_p[udg_i[1]], udg_r[1] )
            call RemoveLocation (udg_p[udg_i[1]])
            call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_Create_Projectiles )
            set udg_i[1] = udg_i[1] + 1
        endloop
        set udg_i[2] = 15
        set udg_i[1] = 1
        loop
            exitwhen udg_i[1] > 7
            set udg_r[1] = ( AngleBetweenPoints(udg_p[0], udg_p[100]) + ( ( I2R(udg_i[1]) * 4.00 ) - 14.00 ) )
            set udg_p[udg_i[1]] = PolarProjectionBJ(udg_p[0], ( 5.00 * udg_projectile_area[udg_i[2]] ), udg_r[1])
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n001', GetOwningPlayer(udg_u[1]), udg_p[udg_i[1]], udg_r[1] )
            call RemoveLocation (udg_p[udg_i[1]])
            call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_Create_Projectiles )
            set udg_i[1] = udg_i[1] + 1
        endloop
    else
    endif
    // Attack 2
    if ( Trig_Hydra_Attack_Func011C() ) then
        set udg_i[2] = 16
        set udg_i[1] = 1
        loop
            exitwhen udg_i[1] > 12
            set udg_r[1] = ( AngleBetweenPoints(udg_p[0], udg_p[100]) + ( ( I2R(udg_i[1]) * 5.00 ) - 30.00 ) )
            set udg_p[udg_i[1]] = PolarProjectionBJ(udg_p[0], ( 5.00 * udg_projectile_area[udg_i[2]] ), udg_r[1])
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n001', GetOwningPlayer(udg_u[1]), udg_p[udg_i[1]], udg_r[1] )
            call RemoveLocation (udg_p[udg_i[1]])
            call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_Create_Projectiles )
            set udg_i[1] = udg_i[1] + 1
        endloop
    else
    endif
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Periodic_Projectiles )
    call RemoveLocation (udg_p[0])
    call RemoveLocation (udg_p[100])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Hydra_Attack takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Hydra_Attack = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Hydra_Attack, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Hydra_Attack, Condition( function Trig_Hydra_Attack_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Hydra_Attack, function Trig_Hydra_Attack_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Hydra Special Start
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Hydra_Special_Start_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(udg_boss_hydra, 'BPSE') == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hydra_Special_Start_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Hydra_Special_Start_Func001C() ) then
        call PauseUnitBJ( false, udg_boss_hydra )
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( udg_boss_hydra, "channel" )
        call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Hydra_Periodic_Special )
        call StartTimerBJ( udg_boss_hydra_spec_timer, false, 8.00 )
        set udg_p[1] = GetUnitLoc(udg_boss_hydra)
        set udg_p[2] = GetUnitLoc(udg_player_character)
        set udg_r[1] = AngleBetweenPoints(udg_p[1], udg_p[2])
        call RemoveLocation (udg_p[2])
        set udg_p[2] = PolarProjectionBJ(udg_p[1], 1000.00, udg_r[1])
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n001', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), udg_p[2], bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call RemoveLocation (udg_p[1])
        call RemoveLocation (udg_p[2])
        set udg_boss_hydra_spec_lock = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ( 8.00, 'BTLF', udg_boss_hydra_spec_lock )
        call SetUnitLookAt( udg_boss_hydra, "bone_head", udg_boss_hydra_spec_lock, 0, 0, 0.00 )
        call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Hydra_Periodic_Lock )
    else
        call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Hydra_Fog_Darken )
        call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Hydra_Fog_Normal )
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Hydra_Special_Start takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Hydra_Special_Start = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ( gg_trg_Hydra_Special_Start, udg_boss_hydra_spec_prep )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Hydra_Special_Start, function Trig_Hydra_Special_Start_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Hydra Periodic Special
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Hydra_Periodic_Special_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_i[2] = GetRandomInt(13, 15)
    set udg_p[1] = GetUnitLoc(udg_boss_hydra)
    set udg_p[2] = GetUnitLoc(udg_player_character)
    set udg_r[1] = ( AngleBetweenPoints(udg_p[1], udg_p[2]) + GetRandomReal(-35.00, 35.00) )
    set udg_p[2] = PolarProjectionBJ(udg_p[1], ( 7.00 * udg_projectile_area[udg_i[2]] ), udg_r[1])
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n001', udg_player_enemy, udg_p[2], udg_r[1] )
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_Create_Projectiles )
    call RemoveLocation (udg_p[1])
    call RemoveLocation (udg_p[2])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Hydra_Periodic_Special takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Hydra_Periodic_Special = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Hydra_Periodic_Special )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_Hydra_Periodic_Special, 0.10 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Hydra_Periodic_Special, function Trig_Hydra_Periodic_Special_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Hydra Periodic Lock
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Hydra_Periodic_Lock_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_p[1] = GetUnitLoc(udg_boss_hydra)
    set udg_p[2] = GetUnitLoc(udg_player_character)
    set udg_r[1] = AngleBetweenPoints(udg_p[1], udg_p[2])
    call RemoveLocation (udg_p[2])
    set udg_p[2] = PolarProjectionBJ(udg_p[1], 1000.00, udg_r[1])
    call SetUnitPositionLoc( udg_boss_hydra_spec_lock, udg_p[2] )
    call RemoveLocation (udg_p[1])
    call RemoveLocation (udg_p[2])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Hydra_Periodic_Lock takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Hydra_Periodic_Lock = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Hydra_Periodic_Lock )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_Hydra_Periodic_Lock, 0.03 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Hydra_Periodic_Lock, function Trig_Hydra_Periodic_Lock_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Hydra Special End
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Hydra_Special_End_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call PauseUnitBJ( false, udg_boss_hydra )
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( udg_boss_hydra, "stop" )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Hydra_Periodic_Special )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Hydra_Periodic_Lock )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Hydra_Fog_Darken )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Hydra_Fog_Normal )
    call ResetUnitLookAt( udg_boss_hydra )
    call StartTimerBJ( udg_boss_hydra_spec_cd, false, udg_boss_hydra_spec_cd_value )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Hydra_Special_End takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Hydra_Special_End = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ( gg_trg_Hydra_Special_End, udg_boss_hydra_spec_timer )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Hydra_Special_End, function Trig_Hydra_Special_End_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Hydra Special Ready
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Hydra_Special_Ready_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_boss_hydra_spec_ready = true
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Hydra_Special_Ready takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Hydra_Special_Ready = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ( gg_trg_Hydra_Special_Ready, udg_boss_hydra_spec_cd )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Hydra_Special_Ready, function Trig_Hydra_Special_Ready_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Hydra Fog Darken
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Hydra_Fog_Darken_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_fog_R <= 30.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hydra_Fog_Darken_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_fog_R = ( udg_fog_R - 1.00 )
    set udg_fog_G = ( udg_fog_G - 4.50 )
    set udg_fog_B = ( udg_fog_B - 4.50 )
    set udg_fog_Z = ( udg_fog_Z - 25.00 )
    if ( Trig_Hydra_Fog_Darken_Func005C() ) then
        set udg_fog_R = 30.00
        set udg_fog_B = 30.00
        set udg_fog_G = 30.00
        set udg_fog_Z = 1700.00
        call DisableTrigger( GetTriggeringTrigger() )
    else
    endif
    call SetTerrainFogExBJ( 0, 0.00, udg_fog_Z, 0, ( udg_fog_R / 2.55 ), ( udg_fog_G / 2.55 ), ( udg_fog_B / 2.55 ) )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Hydra_Fog_Darken takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Hydra_Fog_Darken = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Hydra_Fog_Darken )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_Hydra_Fog_Darken, 0.03 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Hydra_Fog_Darken, function Trig_Hydra_Fog_Darken_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Hydra Fog Normal
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Hydra_Fog_Normal_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_fog_R >= 50.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hydra_Fog_Normal_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_fog_R = ( udg_fog_R + 1.00 )
    set udg_fog_G = ( udg_fog_G + 4.50 )
    set udg_fog_B = ( udg_fog_B + 4.50 )
    set udg_fog_Z = ( udg_fog_Z + 25.00 )
    if ( Trig_Hydra_Fog_Normal_Func005C() ) then
        set udg_fog_R = 50.00
        set udg_fog_B = 120.00
        set udg_fog_G = 120.00
        set udg_fog_Z = 2200.00
        call DisableTrigger( GetTriggeringTrigger() )
    else
    endif
    call SetTerrainFogExBJ( 0, 0.00, udg_fog_Z, 0, ( udg_fog_R / 2.55 ), ( udg_fog_G / 2.55 ), ( udg_fog_B / 2.55 ) )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Hydra_Fog_Normal takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Hydra_Fog_Normal = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Hydra_Fog_Normal )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_Hydra_Fog_Normal, 0.03 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Hydra_Fog_Normal, function Trig_Hydra_Fog_Normal_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Hydra Impact
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Hydra_Impact_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'n001' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == udg_player ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hydra_Impact_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitUserData(GetTriggerUnit()) > 100 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hydra_Impact_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Hydra_Impact_Func001C() ) then
        call PauseTimerBJ( true, udg_boss_hydra_spec_prep )
        call PauseTimerBJ( true, udg_boss_hydra_spec_timer )
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_Hydra_Special_End )
        call PauseUnitBJ( false, udg_boss_hydra )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n001', udg_player, Location(8180.00, 2310.00), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ( 1.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'AHtb', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), "thunderbolt", udg_boss_hydra )
    else
    endif
    call KillUnit( GetTriggerUnit() )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Hydra_Impact takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Hydra_Impact = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_Hydra_Impact, gg_rct_Moonlight12_HydraImpact )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Hydra_Impact, Condition( function Trig_Hydra_Impact_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Hydra_Impact, function Trig_Hydra_Impact_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Turtle Setup
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Turtle_Setup_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_reg_quad[1] = null
    set udg_reg_quad[1] = gg_rct_TurtleQuad01
    set udg_reg_quad[2] = gg_rct_TurtleQuad02
    set udg_reg_quad[3] = gg_rct_TurtleQuad04
    set udg_reg_quad[4] = gg_rct_TurtleQuad03
    set udg_p[0] = GetUnitLoc(udg_boss_turtle)
    set udg_r[1] = GetUnitFacing(udg_boss_turtle)
    set udg_p[1] = PolarProjectionBJ(udg_p[0], 256, ( udg_r[1] + 45.00 ))
    set udg_p[2] = PolarProjectionBJ(udg_p[0], 256, ( udg_r[1] - 45.00 ))
    set udg_p[3] = PolarProjectionBJ(udg_p[0], 256, ( udg_r[1] - 315.00 ))
    set udg_p[4] = PolarProjectionBJ(udg_p[0], 256, ( udg_r[1] + 315.00 ))
    set udg_i[1] = 1
    loop
        exitwhen udg_i[1] > 4
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'h00B', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_p[udg_i[1]], bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_boss_turt_leg[udg_i[1]] = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveLocation (udg_p[udg_i[1]])
        set udg_i[1] = udg_i[1] + 1
    endloop
    call RemoveLocation (udg_p[udg_i[0]])
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Dragon_Turtle_Legs )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Turtle_Setup takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Turtle_Setup = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Turtle_Setup, function Trig_Turtle_Setup_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Dragon Turtle Attack
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Dragon_Turtle_Attack_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == udg_enemy_type[11] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dragon_Turtle_Attack_Func007Func003Func004Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitLifePercent(udg_boss_turtle) < 70.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_boss_turt_spec_inc == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dragon_Turtle_Attack_Func007Func003Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_i[3] >= 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dragon_Turtle_Attack_Func007Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_i[3] >= 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_i[3] <= 6 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dragon_Turtle_Attack_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_i[3] <= 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dragon_Turtle_Attack_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_u[1] = GetAttacker()
    set udg_p[0] = GetUnitLoc(udg_u[1])
    set udg_p[100] = GetUnitLoc(udg_player_character)
    set udg_i[2] = 11
    set udg_i[3] = GetRandomInt(1, 10)
    if ( Trig_Dragon_Turtle_Attack_Func007C() ) then
        set udg_i[1] = 1
        loop
            exitwhen udg_i[1] > 24
            set udg_r[1] = ( AngleBetweenPoints(udg_p[0], udg_p[100]) + ( I2R(udg_i[1]) * 15.00 ) )
            set udg_p[udg_i[1]] = PolarProjectionBJ(udg_p[0], ( 5.00 * udg_projectile_area[udg_i[2]] ), udg_r[1])
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n001', GetOwningPlayer(udg_u[1]), udg_p[udg_i[1]], udg_r[1] )
            call RemoveLocation (udg_p[udg_i[1]])
            call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_Create_Projectiles )
            set udg_i[1] = udg_i[1] + 1
        endloop
        call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Periodic_Projectiles )
    else
        if ( Trig_Dragon_Turtle_Attack_Func007Func003C() ) then
            set udg_i[1] = 1
            loop
                exitwhen udg_i[1] > 15
                set udg_r[1] = ( AngleBetweenPoints(udg_p[0], udg_p[100]) + ( I2R(udg_i[1]) * 24.00 ) )
                set udg_p[udg_i[1]] = PolarProjectionBJ(udg_p[0], ( 5.00 * udg_projectile_area[udg_i[2]] ), udg_r[1])
                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n001', GetOwningPlayer(udg_u[1]), udg_p[udg_i[1]], udg_r[1] )
                call RemoveLocation (udg_p[udg_i[1]])
                call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_Create_Projectiles )
                set udg_i[1] = udg_i[1] + 1
            endloop
            call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Periodic_Projectiles )
        else
            if ( Trig_Dragon_Turtle_Attack_Func007Func003Func004C() ) then
                if ( Trig_Dragon_Turtle_Attack_Func007Func003Func004Func001C() ) then
                    set udg_i[1] = 1
                    loop
                        exitwhen udg_i[1] > 4
                        call ShowUnitHide( udg_boss_turt_leg[udg_i[1]] )
                        call UnitAddTypeBJ( UNIT_TYPE_MECHANICAL, udg_boss_turt_leg[udg_i[1]] )
                        set udg_i[1] = udg_i[1] + 1
                    endloop
                    call PauseUnitBJ( true, udg_u[1] )
                    call SetUnitAnimationByIndex(udg_u[1], 1)
                    call SetUnitVertexColorBJ( udg_u[1], 100, 100, 100, 30.00 )
                    call SetUnitFlyHeightBJ( udg_u[1], 500.00, 500.00 )
                    call StartTimerBJ( udg_boss_turt_spec_timer, false, 8.00 )
                    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Dragon_Turtle_Special )
                else
                    set udg_r[1] = AngleBetweenPoints(udg_p[0], udg_p[100])
                    set udg_i[1] = 1
                    loop
                        exitwhen udg_i[1] > 20
                        set udg_p[udg_i[1]] = PolarProjectionBJ(udg_p[0], udg_projectile_area[udg_i[2]], ( ( udg_r[1] - 75.00 ) + ( 5.00 * I2R(udg_i[1]) ) ))
                        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n001', GetOwningPlayer(udg_u[1]), udg_p[udg_i[1]], ( ( udg_r[1] - 75.00 ) + ( 5.00 * I2R(udg_i[1]) ) ) )
                        call RemoveLocation (udg_p[udg_i[1]])
                        call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_Create_Projectiles )
                        set udg_i[1] = udg_i[1] + 1
                    endloop
                    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Periodic_Projectiles )
                endif
            else
            endif
        endif
    endif
    call RemoveLocation (udg_p[0])
    call RemoveLocation (udg_p[100])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Dragon_Turtle_Attack takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Dragon_Turtle_Attack = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Dragon_Turtle_Attack, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Dragon_Turtle_Attack, Condition( function Trig_Dragon_Turtle_Attack_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Dragon_Turtle_Attack, function Trig_Dragon_Turtle_Attack_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Dragon Turtle Legs
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Dragon_Turtle_Legs_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_r[1] = GetUnitFacing(udg_boss_turtle)
    set udg_p[0] = GetUnitLoc(udg_boss_turtle)
    set udg_p[1] = PolarProjectionBJ(udg_p[0], 200.00, ( udg_r[1] + 45.00 ))
    set udg_p[2] = PolarProjectionBJ(udg_p[0], 200.00, ( udg_r[1] - 45.00 ))
    set udg_p[3] = PolarProjectionBJ(udg_p[0], 200.00, ( udg_r[1] - 135.00 ))
    set udg_p[4] = PolarProjectionBJ(udg_p[0], 200.00, ( udg_r[1] + 135.00 ))
    set udg_i[1] = 1
    loop
        exitwhen udg_i[1] > 4
        call SetUnitPositionLoc( udg_boss_turt_leg[udg_i[1]], udg_p[udg_i[1]] )
        call RemoveLocation (udg_p[udg_i[1]])
        set udg_i[1] = udg_i[1] + 1
    endloop
    call RemoveLocation (udg_p[udg_i[0]])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Dragon_Turtle_Legs takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Dragon_Turtle_Legs = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Dragon_Turtle_Legs )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_Dragon_Turtle_Legs, 0.03 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Dragon_Turtle_Legs, function Trig_Dragon_Turtle_Legs_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Dragon Turtle Special
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Dragon_Turtle_Special_Func002Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A00J', GetFilterUnit()) > 0 )
endfunction

function Trig_Dragon_Turtle_Special_Func002Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_ug[1]) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dragon_Turtle_Special_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_i[1] == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dragon_Turtle_Special_Func003Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A00J', GetFilterUnit()) > 0 )
endfunction

function Trig_Dragon_Turtle_Special_Func003Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_ug[1]) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dragon_Turtle_Special_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_i[1] = GetRandomInt(1, 5)
    if ( Trig_Dragon_Turtle_Special_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_p[1] = GetUnitLoc(udg_player_character)
        set udg_ug[1] = GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(100.00, udg_p[1], Condition(function Trig_Dragon_Turtle_Special_Func002Func002002003))
        if ( Trig_Dragon_Turtle_Special_Func002Func003C() ) then
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n001', udg_player_enemy, udg_p[1], 270.00 )
            call SetUnitFlyHeightBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 0.00, 0.00 )
            call SetUnitScalePercent( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 150.00, 150.00, 150.00 )
            call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ( udg_boss_turt_spec_exp, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A00J', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        else
        endif
        call DestroyGroup (udg_ug[1])
        call RemoveLocation (udg_p[1])
    else
    endif
    set udg_i[2] = 1
    loop
        exitwhen udg_i[2] > 4
        set udg_p[1] = GetRandomLocInRect(udg_reg_quad[udg_i[2]])
        set udg_ug[1] = GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(100.00, udg_p[1], Condition(function Trig_Dragon_Turtle_Special_Func003Func002002003))
        if ( Trig_Dragon_Turtle_Special_Func003Func003C() ) then
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n001', udg_player_enemy, udg_p[1], 270.00 )
            call SetUnitFlyHeightBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 0.00, 0.00 )
            call SetUnitScalePercent( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 150.00, 150.00, 150.00 )
            call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ( udg_boss_turt_spec_exp, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A00J', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        else
        endif
        call DestroyGroup (udg_ug[1])
        call RemoveLocation (udg_p[1])
        set udg_i[2] = udg_i[2] + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Dragon_Turtle_Special takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Dragon_Turtle_Special = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Dragon_Turtle_Special )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_Dragon_Turtle_Special, 0.40 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Dragon_Turtle_Special, function Trig_Dragon_Turtle_Special_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Dragon Turtle Special End
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Dragon_Turtle_Special_End_Func001Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_boss_turt_spec_inc == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dragon_Turtle_Special_End_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_boss_turt_spec_inc == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dragon_Turtle_Special_End_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_boss_turt_spec_inc == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dragon_Turtle_Special_End_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Dragon_Turtle_Special_End_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_boss_turt_spec_inc = 1
        call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Dragon_Turtle_Special )
        call SetUnitFlyHeightBJ( udg_boss_turtle, 0.00, 500.00 )
        call StartTimerBJ( udg_boss_turt_spec_timer, false, 1.00 )
    else
        if ( Trig_Dragon_Turtle_Special_End_Func001Func001C() ) then
            set udg_boss_turt_spec_inc = 2
            call ResetUnitAnimation( udg_boss_turtle )
            call SetUnitVertexColorBJ( udg_boss_turtle, 100, 100, 100, 0 )
            call PauseUnitBJ( false, udg_boss_turtle )
            call StartTimerBJ( udg_boss_turt_spec_timer, false, udg_boss_turt_spec_cd )
            set udg_i[1] = 1
            loop
                exitwhen udg_i[1] > 4
                call ShowUnitShow( udg_boss_turt_leg[udg_i[1]] )
                call UnitRemoveTypeBJ( UNIT_TYPE_MECHANICAL, udg_boss_turt_leg[udg_i[1]] )
                set udg_i[1] = udg_i[1] + 1
            endloop
        else
            if ( Trig_Dragon_Turtle_Special_End_Func001Func001Func002C() ) then
                set udg_boss_turt_spec_inc = 0
            else
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Dragon_Turtle_Special_End takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Dragon_Turtle_Special_End = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ( gg_trg_Dragon_Turtle_Special_End, udg_boss_turt_spec_timer )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Dragon_Turtle_Special_End, function Trig_Dragon_Turtle_Special_End_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
