// Trigger: Spawn Turtle Hatch
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Spawn_Turtle_Hatch_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_i[1] == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Spawn_Turtle_Hatch_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_i[1] = GetRandomInt(1, 2)
    if ( Trig_Spawn_Turtle_Hatch_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_p[1] = GetRectCenter(gg_rct_HatchlingSpawn01)
    else
        set udg_p[1] = GetRectCenter(gg_rct_HatchlingSpawn02)
    endif
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'h005', udg_player_enemy, udg_p[1], bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), "attack", udg_player_character )
    call RemoveLocation (udg_p[1])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Spawn_Turtle_Hatch takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Spawn_Turtle_Hatch = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Spawn_Turtle_Hatch, function Trig_Spawn_Turtle_Hatch_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Take Damage
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Take_Damage_Func002Func001Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( udg_player_swm_invul == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( udg_player_hit_invul == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Take_Damage_Func002Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_player_character ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Take_Damage_Func002Func001Func002Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Take_Damage_Func002Func001Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( udg_boss_wtch_swm_ready == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( udg_boss_wtch_vuln == false ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Take_Damage_Func002Func001Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_boss_wtch ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Take_Damage_Func002Func001Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Take_Damage_Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitUserData(GetEventDamageSource()) == 101 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( Trig_Take_Damage_Func002Func001Func002C() ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( Trig_Take_Damage_Func002Func001Func003C() ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Take_Damage_Func002Func002Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_player_character ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_player_character) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Take_Damage_Func002Func002Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEventDamageSource()) == udg_enemy_type[10] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEventDamageSource()) == udg_enemy_type[2] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEventDamageSource()) == 'n001' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Take_Damage_Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MECHANICAL) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() != udg_boss_hydra ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Take_Damage_Func002Func002Func006C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Take_Damage_Func002Func005Func011Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsTerrainPathableBJ(udg_p[3], PATHING_TYPE_WALKABILITY) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Take_Damage_Func002Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitUserData(GetEventDamageSource()) != 101 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_boss_wtch ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_boss_wtch_swm_ready == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_boss_wtch_vuln == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Take_Damage_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Take_Damage_Func002Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Take_Damage_Func004Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == udg_enemy_type[2] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == udg_enemy_type[10] ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Take_Damage_Func004Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_i[1] == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Take_Damage_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Take_Damage_Func004Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Take_Damage_Func006Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_boss_turtle) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitLifePercent(udg_boss_turtle) < 90.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_boss_turt_milestone[1] == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Take_Damage_Func006Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_boss_turtle) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitLifePercent(udg_boss_turtle) < 70.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_boss_turt_milestone[2] == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Take_Damage_Func006Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_boss_turtle) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitLifePercent(udg_boss_turtle) < 30.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_boss_turt_milestone[3] == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Take_Damage_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'h00B' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Take_Damage_Func008Func001Func001Func003Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_rage == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Take_Damage_Func008Func001Func001Func003Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_rage == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Take_Damage_Func008Func001Func001Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_rage == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Take_Damage_Func008Func001Func001Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'n005' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Take_Damage_Func008Func001Func001Func016C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_cryst_rage_toggled == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Take_Damage_Func008Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'n003' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitUserData(GetTriggerUnit()) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Take_Damage_Func008Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'n004' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Take_Damage_Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'n002' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Take_Damage_Func010Func001Func007Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_projectile_amount[udg_i[1]] == 6 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Take_Damage_Func010Func001Func007Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_projectile_amount[udg_i[1]] == 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Take_Damage_Func010Func001Func007Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_projectile_amount[udg_i[1]] == 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Take_Damage_Func010Func001Func007Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_projectile_amount[udg_i[1]] == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Take_Damage_Func010Func001Func007Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_projectile_amount[udg_i[1]] == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Take_Damage_Func010Func001Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_projectile_amount[udg_i[1]] == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Take_Damage_Func010Func001Func009C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_i[1] == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Take_Damage_Func010Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEventDamageSource()) == udg_enemy_type[udg_i[1]] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Take_Damage_Func012Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == gg_unit_n007_0027 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Take_Damage_Func012Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == gg_unit_n007_0010 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Take_Damage_Func012Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == gg_unit_n007_0005 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Take_Damage_Func012C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'n007' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitUserData(GetTriggerUnit()) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Take_Damage_Func014Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'n00A' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'n00B' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Take_Damage_Func014Func006Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_i[1] >= 9 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Take_Damage_Func014Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_i[1] == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Take_Damage_Func014C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Take_Damage_Func014Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitUserData(GetTriggerUnit()) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Take_Damage_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    // Take Hit
    if ( Trig_Take_Damage_Func002C() ) then
        call BlzSetEventDamage( 0.0 )
        // Sea Witch Swim
        if ( Trig_Take_Damage_Func002Func005C() ) then
            set udg_boss_wtch_swm_inc = GetRandomInt(1, udg_boss_wtch_swm_inc_max)
            set udg_boss_wtch_swm_ready = false
            set udg_p[1] = GetUnitLoc(udg_player_character)
            set udg_p[2] = GetUnitLoc(udg_boss_wtch)
            set udg_i[1] = GetRandomInt(1, 2)
            call StopSoundBJ( udg_action_swm_snd[udg_i[1]], false )
            call PlaySoundAtPointBJ( udg_action_swm_snd[udg_i[1]], 50.00, udg_p[2], 0 )
            set udg_r[1] = AngleBetweenPoints(udg_p[1], udg_p[2])
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A00L', udg_boss_wtch )
            set bj_forLoopAIndex = 1
            set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd = 10
            loop
                exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
                set udg_r[2] = GetRandomDirectionDeg()
                set udg_p[3] = PolarProjectionBJ(udg_p[2], ( udg_boss_wtch_swm_duration * udg_boss_wtch_swm_duration ), udg_r[2])
                if ( Trig_Take_Damage_Func002Func005Func011Func003C() ) then
                    set udg_r[3] = udg_r[2]
                else
                endif
                call RemoveLocation (udg_p[3])
                set bj_forLoopAIndex = bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
            endloop
            set udg_boss_wtch_swm_angle = ( udg_r[1] + udg_r[3] )
            call RemoveLocation (udg_p[1])
            call RemoveLocation (udg_p[2])
            call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Sea_Witch_Swim_Periodic )
            call StartTimerBJ( udg_boss_wtch_swm_timer, false, udg_boss_wtch_swm_duration )
        else
        endif
    else
        if ( Trig_Take_Damage_Func002Func002C() ) then
            call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ( "chest", GetTriggerUnit(), "BloodHit.mdx" )
            call DestroyEffectBJ( GetLastCreatedEffectBJ() )
            if ( Trig_Take_Damage_Func002Func002Func004C() ) then
                set udg_player_hit_invul = true
                call StartTimerBJ( udg_player_hit_invul_timer, false, udg_player_hit_invul_time )
            else
            endif
        else
        endif
    endif
    // Reflect Projectile
    if ( Trig_Take_Damage_Func004C() ) then
        set udg_p[1] = GetUnitLoc(GetEventDamageSource())
        set udg_i[1] = GetRandomInt(1, 2)
        if ( Trig_Take_Damage_Func004Func004C() ) then
            set udg_r[1] = ( GetUnitFacing(GetEventDamageSource()) + 165.00 )
        else
            set udg_r[1] = ( GetUnitFacing(GetEventDamageSource()) + 195.00 )
        endif
        set udg_p[2] = PolarProjectionBJ(udg_p[1], udg_projectile_area[2], udg_r[1])
        set udg_i[2] = 2
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n001', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_p[2], udg_r[1] )
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_Create_Projectiles )
        call RemoveLocation (udg_p[1])
        call RemoveLocation (udg_p[2])
    else
    endif
    // Turtle Boss Legs
    if ( Trig_Take_Damage_Func006C() ) then
        call SetUnitLifeBJ( udg_boss_turtle, ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, udg_boss_turtle) - GetEventDamage() ) )
        if ( Trig_Take_Damage_Func006Func002C() ) then
            set udg_boss_turt_milestone[1] = true
            call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_Spawn_Turtle_Hatch )
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_Take_Damage_Func006Func003C() ) then
            set udg_boss_turt_milestone[2] = true
            call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_Spawn_Turtle_Hatch )
            call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_Spawn_Turtle_Hatch )
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_Take_Damage_Func006Func004C() ) then
            set udg_boss_turt_milestone[3] = true
            call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_Spawn_Turtle_Hatch )
            call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_Spawn_Turtle_Hatch )
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
    // Crystals
    if ( Trig_Take_Damage_Func008C() ) then
        set udg_p[1] = GetUnitLoc(GetEventDamageSource())
        set udg_r[1] = GetUnitFacing(GetEventDamageSource())
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( udg_projectile_type[0], GetEventDamageSource() )
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ( udg_projectile_type[100], GetEventDamageSource() )
        call SetUnitUserData( GetEventDamageSource(), 100 )
        call RemoveLocation (udg_p[1])
        call RemoveLocation (udg_p[2])
    else
        if ( Trig_Take_Damage_Func008Func001C() ) then
            call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ( "origin", GetTriggerUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\OrbOfDeath\\AnnihilationMissile.mdl" )
            call DestroyEffectBJ( GetLastCreatedEffectBJ() )
            call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_Clear_Projectiles )
        else
            if ( Trig_Take_Damage_Func008Func001Func001C() ) then
                set udg_u[1] = GetTriggerUnit()
                set udg_rage = ( udg_rage + 1 )
                if ( Trig_Take_Damage_Func008Func001Func001Func003C() ) then
                    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ( "origin", udg_player_character, "Rage1.mdx" )
                    set udg_rage_fx = GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
                else
                    if ( Trig_Take_Damage_Func008Func001Func001Func003Func001C() ) then
                        call DestroyEffectBJ( udg_rage_fx )
                        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ( "origin", udg_player_character, "Rage2.mdx" )
                        set udg_rage_fx = GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
                    else
                        if ( Trig_Take_Damage_Func008Func001Func001Func003Func001Func001C() ) then
                            call DestroyEffectBJ( udg_rage_fx )
                            call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ( "origin", udg_player_character, "Rage3.mdx" )
                            set udg_rage_fx = GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
                        else
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
                call SetUnitUserData( GetTriggerUnit(), 1 )
                call KillUnit( GetEventDamageSource() )
                call SetUnitAnimation( udg_u[1], "death" )
                call CinematicFadeBJ( bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEOUTIN, 1.00, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\DreamFilter_Mask.blp", 100.00, 25.00, 25.00, 25.00 )
                set udg_p[1] = GetUnitLoc(udg_u[1])
                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n001', udg_player, udg_p[1], bj_UNIT_FACING )
                call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ( 1.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
                call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'ACro', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
                call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), "roar" )
                call RemoveLocation (udg_p[1])
                call StartTimerBJ( udg_cryst_rage_timer, false, udg_cryst_rage_duration )
                if ( Trig_Take_Damage_Func008Func001Func001Func016C() ) then
                    set udg_cryst_rage_toggled = true
                    call DialogDisplayBJ( true, udg_cryst_rage_dialog, udg_player )
                else
                endif
                call CameraSetEQNoiseForPlayer( udg_player, 1.00 )
            else
                if ( Trig_Take_Damage_Func008Func001Func001Func005C() ) then
                    set udg_p[1] = GetUnitLoc(GetEventDamageSource())
                    set udg_r[1] = GetUnitFacing(GetEventDamageSource())
                    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( udg_projectile_type[0], GetEventDamageSource() )
                    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( udg_projectile_type[101], GetEventDamageSource() )
                    call SetUnitUserData( GetEventDamageSource(), 101 )
                    call SetUnitScalePercent( GetEventDamageSource(), udg_projectile_size[101], udg_projectile_size[101], udg_projectile_size[101] )
                    call RemoveLocation (udg_p[1])
                    call RemoveLocation (udg_p[2])
                else
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
    // Create Enemy Projectiles
    set udg_i[1] = 1
    loop
        exitwhen udg_i[1] > udg_projectile_list
        if ( Trig_Take_Damage_Func010Func001C() ) then
            set udg_i[2] = udg_i[1]
            set udg_u[1] = GetEventDamageSource()
            set udg_p[1] = GetUnitLoc(udg_u[1])
            set udg_p[2] = GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
            set udg_r[1] = AngleBetweenPoints(udg_p[1], udg_p[2])
            // Set Increments
            if ( Trig_Take_Damage_Func010Func001Func007C() ) then
                set udg_p[3] = PolarProjectionBJ(udg_p[1], udg_projectile_area[udg_i[1]], GetUnitFacing(udg_u[1]))
                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n001', GetOwningPlayer(udg_u[1]), udg_p[3], AngleBetweenPoints(udg_p[1], udg_p[2]) )
                call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_Create_Projectiles )
                call RemoveLocation (udg_p[3])
            else
                if ( Trig_Take_Damage_Func010Func001Func007Func001C() ) then
                    set udg_p[3] = PolarProjectionBJ(udg_p[1], ( 2.00 * udg_projectile_area[udg_i[1]] ), ( GetUnitFacing(udg_u[1]) + 20.00 ))
                    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n001', GetOwningPlayer(udg_u[1]), udg_p[3], udg_r[1] )
                    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_Create_Projectiles )
                    set udg_p[4] = PolarProjectionBJ(udg_p[1], ( 2.00 * udg_projectile_area[udg_i[1]] ), ( GetUnitFacing(udg_u[1]) - 20.00 ))
                    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n001', GetOwningPlayer(udg_u[1]), udg_p[4], udg_r[1] )
                    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_Create_Projectiles )
                    call RemoveLocation (udg_p[3])
                    call RemoveLocation (udg_p[4])
                else
                    if ( Trig_Take_Damage_Func010Func001Func007Func001Func001C() ) then
                        set udg_p[3] = PolarProjectionBJ(udg_p[1], udg_projectile_area[udg_i[1]], GetUnitFacing(udg_u[1]))
                        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n001', GetOwningPlayer(udg_u[1]), udg_p[3], udg_r[1] )
                        call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_Create_Projectiles )
                        set udg_p[4] = PolarProjectionBJ(udg_p[1], udg_projectile_area[udg_i[1]], ( GetUnitFacing(udg_u[1]) + 15.00 ))
                        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n001', GetOwningPlayer(udg_u[1]), udg_p[4], ( udg_r[1] + 15.00 ) )
                        call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_Create_Projectiles )
                        set udg_p[5] = PolarProjectionBJ(udg_p[1], udg_projectile_area[udg_i[1]], ( GetUnitFacing(udg_u[1]) - 15.00 ))
                        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n001', GetOwningPlayer(udg_u[1]), udg_p[5], ( udg_r[1] - 15.00 ) )
                        call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_Create_Projectiles )
                        call RemoveLocation (udg_p[3])
                        call RemoveLocation (udg_p[4])
                        call RemoveLocation (udg_p[5])
                    else
                        if ( Trig_Take_Damage_Func010Func001Func007Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                            set udg_p[3] = PolarProjectionBJ(udg_p[1], ( 2.00 * udg_projectile_area[udg_i[1]] ), ( GetUnitFacing(udg_u[1]) + 25.00 ))
                            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n001', GetOwningPlayer(udg_u[1]), udg_p[3], udg_r[1] )
                            call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_Create_Projectiles )
                            set udg_p[4] = PolarProjectionBJ(udg_p[1], ( 2.00 * udg_projectile_area[udg_i[1]] ), ( GetUnitFacing(udg_u[1]) - 25.00 ))
                            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n001', GetOwningPlayer(udg_u[1]), udg_p[4], udg_r[1] )
                            call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_Create_Projectiles )
                            set udg_p[5] = PolarProjectionBJ(udg_p[1], ( 2.00 * udg_projectile_area[udg_i[1]] ), ( GetUnitFacing(udg_u[1]) - 70.00 ))
                            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n001', GetOwningPlayer(udg_u[1]), udg_p[5], udg_r[1] )
                            call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_Create_Projectiles )
                            set udg_p[6] = PolarProjectionBJ(udg_p[1], ( 2.00 * udg_projectile_area[udg_i[1]] ), ( GetUnitFacing(udg_u[1]) + 70.00 ))
                            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n001', GetOwningPlayer(udg_u[1]), udg_p[6], udg_r[1] )
                            call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_Create_Projectiles )
                            call RemoveLocation (udg_p[3])
                            call RemoveLocation (udg_p[4])
                            call RemoveLocation (udg_p[5])
                            call RemoveLocation (udg_p[6])
                        else
                            if ( Trig_Take_Damage_Func010Func001Func007Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                set udg_p[3] = PolarProjectionBJ(udg_p[1], udg_projectile_area[udg_i[1]], GetUnitFacing(udg_u[1]))
                                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n001', GetOwningPlayer(udg_u[1]), udg_p[3], udg_r[1] )
                                call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_Create_Projectiles )
                                set udg_p[4] = PolarProjectionBJ(udg_p[1], udg_projectile_area[udg_i[1]], ( GetUnitFacing(udg_u[1]) + 15.00 ))
                                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n001', GetOwningPlayer(udg_u[1]), udg_p[4], ( udg_r[1] + 15.00 ) )
                                call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_Create_Projectiles )
                                set udg_p[5] = PolarProjectionBJ(udg_p[1], udg_projectile_area[udg_i[1]], ( GetUnitFacing(udg_u[1]) - 15.00 ))
                                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n001', GetOwningPlayer(udg_u[1]), udg_p[5], ( udg_r[1] - 15.00 ) )
                                call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_Create_Projectiles )
                                set udg_p[6] = PolarProjectionBJ(udg_p[1], udg_projectile_area[udg_i[1]], ( GetUnitFacing(udg_u[1]) - 30.00 ))
                                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n001', GetOwningPlayer(udg_u[1]), udg_p[6], ( udg_r[1] - 30.00 ) )
                                call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_Create_Projectiles )
                                set udg_p[7] = PolarProjectionBJ(udg_p[1], udg_projectile_area[udg_i[1]], ( GetUnitFacing(udg_u[1]) + 30.00 ))
                                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n001', GetOwningPlayer(udg_u[1]), udg_p[7], ( udg_r[1] + 30.00 ) )
                                call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_Create_Projectiles )
                                call RemoveLocation (udg_p[3])
                                call RemoveLocation (udg_p[4])
                                call RemoveLocation (udg_p[5])
                                call RemoveLocation (udg_p[6])
                                call RemoveLocation (udg_p[7])
                            else
                                if ( Trig_Take_Damage_Func010Func001Func007Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                    set udg_p[3] = PolarProjectionBJ(udg_p[1], ( 2.00 * udg_projectile_area[udg_i[1]] ), ( GetUnitFacing(udg_u[1]) + 20.00 ))
                                    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n001', GetOwningPlayer(udg_u[1]), udg_p[3], udg_r[1] )
                                    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_Create_Projectiles )
                                    set udg_p[4] = PolarProjectionBJ(udg_p[1], ( 2.00 * udg_projectile_area[udg_i[1]] ), ( GetUnitFacing(udg_u[1]) - 20.00 ))
                                    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n001', GetOwningPlayer(udg_u[1]), udg_p[4], udg_r[1] )
                                    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_Create_Projectiles )
                                    set udg_p[5] = PolarProjectionBJ(udg_p[1], udg_projectile_area[udg_i[1]], ( GetUnitFacing(udg_u[1]) - 40.00 ))
                                    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n001', GetOwningPlayer(udg_u[1]), udg_p[5], ( udg_r[1] - 40.00 ) )
                                    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_Create_Projectiles )
                                    set udg_p[6] = PolarProjectionBJ(udg_p[1], udg_projectile_area[udg_i[1]], ( GetUnitFacing(udg_u[1]) + 40.00 ))
                                    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n001', GetOwningPlayer(udg_u[1]), udg_p[6], ( udg_r[1] + 40.00 ) )
                                    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_Create_Projectiles )
                                    set udg_p[7] = PolarProjectionBJ(udg_p[1], udg_projectile_area[udg_i[1]], ( GetUnitFacing(udg_u[1]) + 60.00 ))
                                    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n001', GetOwningPlayer(udg_u[1]), udg_p[7], ( udg_r[1] + 60.00 ) )
                                    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_Create_Projectiles )
                                    set udg_p[8] = PolarProjectionBJ(udg_p[1], udg_projectile_area[udg_i[1]], ( GetUnitFacing(udg_u[1]) - 60.00 ))
                                    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n001', GetOwningPlayer(udg_u[1]), udg_p[8], ( udg_r[1] - 60.00 ) )
                                    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_Create_Projectiles )
                                    call RemoveLocation (udg_p[3])
                                    call RemoveLocation (udg_p[4])
                                    call RemoveLocation (udg_p[5])
                                    call RemoveLocation (udg_p[6])
                                    call RemoveLocation (udg_p[7])
                                    call RemoveLocation (udg_p[8])
                                else
                                endif
                            endif
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
            // Berserker
            if ( Trig_Take_Damage_Func010Func001Func009C() ) then
                call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( udg_u[1], "berserk" )
                set udg_p[3] = PolarProjectionBJ(udg_p[1], udg_projectile_area[udg_i[1]], GetUnitFacing(udg_u[1]))
                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n001', GetOwningPlayer(udg_u[1]), udg_p[3], AngleBetweenPoints(udg_p[1], udg_p[2]) )
                call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_Create_Projectiles )
                set udg_p[4] = PolarProjectionBJ(udg_p[1], udg_projectile_area[udg_i[1]], ( GetUnitFacing(udg_u[1]) + GetRandomReal(-60.00, 60.00) ))
                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n001', GetOwningPlayer(udg_u[1]), udg_p[4], ( udg_r[1] + GetRandomReal(-60.00, 60.00) ) )
                call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_Create_Projectiles )
                set udg_p[5] = PolarProjectionBJ(udg_p[1], udg_projectile_area[udg_i[1]], ( GetUnitFacing(udg_u[1]) + GetRandomReal(-60.00, 60.00) ))
                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n001', GetOwningPlayer(udg_u[1]), udg_p[5], ( udg_r[1] + GetRandomReal(-60.00, 60.00) ) )
                call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_Create_Projectiles )
                set udg_p[6] = PolarProjectionBJ(udg_p[1], udg_projectile_area[udg_i[1]], ( GetUnitFacing(udg_u[1]) + GetRandomReal(-60.00, 60.00) ))
                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n001', GetOwningPlayer(udg_u[1]), udg_p[6], ( udg_r[1] + GetRandomReal(-60.00, 60.00) ) )
                call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_Create_Projectiles )
                set udg_p[7] = PolarProjectionBJ(udg_p[1], udg_projectile_area[udg_i[1]], ( GetUnitFacing(udg_u[1]) + GetRandomReal(-60.00, 60.00) ))
                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n001', GetOwningPlayer(udg_u[1]), udg_p[7], ( udg_r[1] + GetRandomReal(-60.00, 60.00) ) )
                call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_Create_Projectiles )
                call RemoveLocation (udg_p[3])
                call RemoveLocation (udg_p[4])
                call RemoveLocation (udg_p[5])
                call RemoveLocation (udg_p[6])
            else
            endif
            call RemoveLocation (udg_p[1])
            call RemoveLocation (udg_p[2])
            call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Periodic_Projectiles )
        else
        endif
        set udg_i[1] = udg_i[1] + 1
    endloop
    // Levers
    if ( Trig_Take_Damage_Func012C() ) then
        if ( Trig_Take_Damage_Func012Func001C() ) then
            call ModifyGateBJ( bj_GATEOPERATION_OPEN, udg_door_destruct[2] )
        else
            if ( Trig_Take_Damage_Func012Func001Func001C() ) then
                call ModifyGateBJ( bj_GATEOPERATION_OPEN, udg_door_destruct[4] )
            else
                if ( Trig_Take_Damage_Func012Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call ModifyGateBJ( bj_GATEOPERATION_OPEN, udg_door_destruct[6] )
                else
                endif
            endif
        endif
        call SetUnitUserData( GetTriggerUnit(), 1 )
        call SetUnitAnimation( GetTriggerUnit(), "death" )
        call KillUnit( GetEventDamageSource() )
    else
    endif
    // Barrels
    if ( Trig_Take_Damage_Func014C() ) then
        call SetUnitUserData( GetTriggerUnit(), 1 )
        call KillUnit( GetTriggerUnit() )
        call KillUnit( GetEventDamageSource() )
        set udg_i[1] = GetRandomInt(1, 10)
        if ( Trig_Take_Damage_Func014Func006C() ) then
            set udg_p[1] = GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'h004', udg_player_enemy, udg_p[1], GetRandomDirectionDeg() )
            call RemoveLocation (udg_p[1])
        else
            if ( Trig_Take_Damage_Func014Func006Func001C() ) then
                set udg_p[1] = GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n008', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_p[1], GetRandomDirectionDeg() )
                call RemoveLocation (udg_p[1])
                call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ( udg_rune_lifespan, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
                call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_rune_group )
                call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Periodic_Runes )
            else
            endif
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Take_Damage takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Take_Damage = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Take_Damage, function Trig_Take_Damage_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Player Hit Immunity
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Player_Hit_Immunity_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_player_hit_invul = false
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Player_Hit_Immunity takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Player_Hit_Immunity = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ( gg_trg_Player_Hit_Immunity, udg_player_hit_invul_timer )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Player_Hit_Immunity, function Trig_Player_Hit_Immunity_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Spawn Enemies
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Spawn_Enemies_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_enemy_spawn_value = ( udg_enemy_spawn_value + 1 )
    set udg_i[1] = 1
    loop
        exitwhen udg_i[1] > udg_enemy_spawn_value
        set udg_i[2] = GetRandomInt(1, 4)
        set udg_p[1] = GetRandomLocInRect(udg_reg_quad[udg_i[2]])
        set udg_i[3] = GetRandomInt(udg_enemy_spawn_type_min, udg_enemy_spawn_type_max)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n001', udg_player_enemy, udg_p[1], GetRandomDirectionDeg() )
        call SetUnitFlyHeightBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 0.00, 0.00 )
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ( 1.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call SetUnitUserData( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_i[3] )
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A00C', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call RemoveLocation (udg_p[1])
        set udg_i[1] = udg_i[1] + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Spawn_Enemies takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Spawn_Enemies = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Spawn_Enemies, function Trig_Spawn_Enemies_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Create Projectiles
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Create_Projectiles_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( udg_projectile_type[udg_i[2]], GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call SetUnitUserData( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_i[2] )
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ( udg_projectile_expiration[udg_i[2]], 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call SetUnitScalePercent( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_projectile_size[udg_i[2]], udg_projectile_size[udg_i[2]], udg_projectile_size[udg_i[2]] )
    call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_projectile_group )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Create_Projectiles takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Create_Projectiles = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Create_Projectiles, function Trig_Create_Projectiles_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Clear Projectiles
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Clear_Projectiles_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call KillUnit( GetEnumUnit() )
endfunction

function Trig_Clear_Projectiles_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ( udg_projectile_group, function Trig_Clear_Projectiles_Func001A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Clear_Projectiles takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Clear_Projectiles = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Clear_Projectiles, function Trig_Clear_Projectiles_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Death
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Death_Func003Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_projectile_group) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Func003Func007Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitUserData(GetTriggerUnit()) == udg_i[1] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Func003Func008Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitUserData(GetTriggerUnit()) == udg_i[1] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A00K', GetTriggerUnit()) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A00C', GetTriggerUnit()) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A00S', GetTriggerUnit()) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A00J', GetTriggerUnit()) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A00T', GetTriggerUnit()) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'n001' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A00C', GetTriggerUnit()) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Func007Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A00K', GetTriggerUnit()) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Func007Func010C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_p[1], udg_p[2]) <= udg_boss_turt_spec_area ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A00J', GetTriggerUnit()) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Func009Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A00T', GetTriggerUnit()) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Func009Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_p[1], udg_p[2]) <= udg_boss_turt_spec_area ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Func009C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A00S', GetTriggerUnit()) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Func011C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == udg_enemy_type[10] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Func013Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_rune_group) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Func013C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'n008' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Func015Func003Func002Func007Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()) == udg_player_enemy ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Func015Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_enemy_spawn_value >= udg_enemy_spawn_max ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_enemy_group_current) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Func015Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_enemy_spawn_value < udg_enemy_spawn_max ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_enemy_group_current) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Func015C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_enemy_group_current) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Func017Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( udg_boss_turtle == GetTriggerUnit() ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( udg_boss_wtch == GetTriggerUnit() ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Func017C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Death_Func017Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Func019Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()) == udg_player_enemy ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Func019Func018Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( udg_checkpoint == 1 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( udg_checkpoint == 5 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Func019Func018Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    call KillUnit( GetEnumUnit() )
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Func019Func018Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_checkpoint == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Func019Func018Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_checkpoint == 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Func019Func018C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Death_Func019Func018Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Func019Func020Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_boss_turtle) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Func019Func020C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_checkpoint == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Func019Func022C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_checkpoint == 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Func019C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_player_character ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    // Projectiles
    if ( Trig_Death_Func003C() ) then
        if ( Trig_Death_Func003Func006C() ) then
            call GroupRemoveUnitSimple( GetTriggerUnit(), udg_projectile_group )
        else
        endif
        set udg_i[1] = 0
        loop
            exitwhen udg_i[1] > udg_projectile_list
            if ( Trig_Death_Func003Func007Func001C() ) then
                call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( udg_projectile_type[udg_i[1]], GetTriggerUnit() )
            else
            endif
            set udg_i[1] = udg_i[1] + 1
        endloop
        set udg_i[1] = 100
        loop
            exitwhen udg_i[1] > 101
            if ( Trig_Death_Func003Func008Func001C() ) then
                call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( udg_projectile_type[udg_i[1]], GetTriggerUnit() )
            else
            endif
            set udg_i[1] = udg_i[1] + 1
        endloop
        call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
        call RemoveUnit( GetTriggerUnit() )
    else
    endif
    // Spawner
    if ( Trig_Death_Func005C() ) then
        set udg_i[1] = GetUnitUserData(GetTriggerUnit())
        set udg_p[1] = GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
        set udg_r[1] = GetUnitFacing(GetTriggerUnit())
        call RemoveUnit( GetTriggerUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, udg_enemy_type[udg_i[1]], udg_player_enemy, udg_p[1], udg_r[1] )
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( udg_p[1], "Objects\\Spawnmodels\\Naga\\NagaDeath\\NagaDeath.mdl" )
        call DestroyEffectBJ( GetLastCreatedEffectBJ() )
        call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_enemy_group_current )
        call RemoveLocation (udg_p[1])
    else
    endif
    // Impale
    if ( Trig_Death_Func007C() ) then
        set udg_p[1] = GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
        set udg_p[2] = GetUnitLoc(udg_player_character)
        call RemoveUnit( GetTriggerUnit() )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n001', udg_player_enemy, udg_p[1], bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call SetUnitScalePercent( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 150.00, 150.00, 150.00 )
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A00K', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ( 1.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        if ( Trig_Death_Func007Func010C() ) then
            call UnitDamageTargetBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_player_character, 1.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL )
        else
        endif
        call RemoveLocation (udg_p[1])
        call RemoveLocation (udg_p[2])
    else
        if ( Trig_Death_Func007Func001C() ) then
            call RemoveUnit( GetTriggerUnit() )
        else
        endif
    endif
    // Boulder
    if ( Trig_Death_Func009C() ) then
        set udg_p[1] = GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
        set udg_p[2] = GetUnitLoc(udg_player_character)
        if ( Trig_Death_Func009Func004C() ) then
            call UnitDamageTargetBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), udg_player_character, 1.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL )
        else
        endif
        call RemoveUnit( GetTriggerUnit() )
        call RemoveLocation (udg_p[1])
        call RemoveLocation (udg_p[2])
    else
        if ( Trig_Death_Func009Func001C() ) then
            call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A00T', GetTriggerUnit() )
        else
        endif
    endif
    // Hatchling
    if ( Trig_Death_Func011C() ) then
        set udg_p[1] = GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
        call RemoveUnit( GetTriggerUnit() )
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( udg_p[1], "Abilities\\Spells\\Orc\\FeralSpirit\\feralspirittarget.mdl" )
        call DestroyEffectBJ( GetLastCreatedEffectBJ() )
        call RemoveLocation (udg_p[1])
    else
    endif
    // Rune
    if ( Trig_Death_Func013C() ) then
        call GroupRemoveUnitSimple( GetTriggerUnit(), udg_rune_group )
        if ( Trig_Death_Func013Func002C() ) then
            call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Periodic_Runes )
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
    // Enemy Spawn Group
    if ( Trig_Death_Func015C() ) then
        call GroupRemoveUnitSimple( GetTriggerUnit(), udg_enemy_group_current )
        if ( Trig_Death_Func015Func003C() ) then
            call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_Spawn_Enemies )
        else
            if ( Trig_Death_Func015Func003Func002C() ) then
                call ModifyGateBJ( bj_GATEOPERATION_OPEN, udg_door_destruct[udg_enemy_wiped_door] )
                set udg_p[1] = GetDestructableLoc(udg_door_destruct[udg_enemy_wiped_door])
                call StopMusicBJ( false )
                call PlaySoundAtPointBJ( udg_door_close_rolling_snd, 100, udg_p[1], 0 )
                call RemoveLocation (udg_p[1])
                set udg_enemy_spawn_value = 0
                call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_Clear_Projectiles )
                set udg_cin_frame = ( udg_cin_frame + 1 )
                call StartTimerBJ( udg_cin_timer, false, 1.00 )
            else
            endif
        endif
    else
    endif
    // Bosses
    if ( Trig_Death_Func017C() ) then
        set udg_cin_frame = ( udg_cin_frame + 1 )
        call StartTimerBJ( udg_cin_timer, false, 0.00 )
    else
    endif
    // Player
    if ( Trig_Death_Func019C() ) then
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_Clear_Projectiles )
        call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Aim_Periodic )
        call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Swim_Periodic )
        call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Periodic_Cam )
        call PauseTimerBJ( true, udg_action_atk_timer )
        call PauseTimerBJ( true, udg_action_swm_timer )
        call PauseTimerBJ( true, udg_action_swm_end_timer )
        call RemoveUnit( udg_action_aim_lock )
        call SetUnitFlyHeightBJ( udg_player_character, 0.00, 160.00 )
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A001', udg_player_character )
        call ModifyGateBJ( bj_GATEOPERATION_OPEN, udg_door_destruct[( udg_checkpoint + 1 )] )
        set udg_action_disabled = true
        set udg_rage = 0
        call DestroyEffectBJ( udg_rage_fx )
        call ClearMapMusicBJ(  )
        call StopMusicBJ( true )
        // Mur'gul/Naga
        if ( Trig_Death_Func019Func018C() ) then
            call DisableTrigger( GetTriggeringTrigger() )
            call ForGroupBJ( udg_enemy_group_current, function Trig_Death_Func019Func018Func003A )
            call EnableTrigger( GetTriggeringTrigger() )
            if ( Trig_Death_Func019Func018Func005C() ) then
                set udg_enemy_spawn_value = 0
                call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Door_02_NonCinematic )
            else
            endif
            if ( Trig_Death_Func019Func018Func006C() ) then
                set udg_enemy_spawn_value = 1
                call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Door_06_NonCinematic )
            else
            endif
        else
        endif
        // Turtle
        if ( Trig_Death_Func019Func020C() ) then
            if ( Trig_Death_Func019Func020Func001C() ) then
                call SetUnitLifePercentBJ( udg_boss_turtle, 100 )
                call PauseUnitBJ( true, udg_boss_turtle )
                call PauseTimerBJ( true, udg_boss_turt_spec_timer )
                call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Dragon_Turtle_Legs )
                call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Dragon_Turtle_Special )
                call SetUnitFlyHeightBJ( udg_boss_turtle, 0.00, 0.00 )
                set bj_forLoopAIndex = 1
                set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd = 4
                loop
                    exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
                    call RemoveUnit( udg_boss_turt_leg[GetForLoopIndexA()] )
                    set bj_forLoopAIndex = bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
                endloop
                call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Door_04_NonCinematic )
            else
            endif
        else
        endif
        // Witch/Hydra
        if ( Trig_Death_Func019Func022C() ) then
            call UnitRemoveBuffsBJ( bj_REMOVEBUFFS_ALL, udg_boss_hydra )
            call PauseTimerBJ( true, udg_boss_hydra_spec_prep )
            call PauseTimerBJ( true, udg_boss_hydra_spec_timer )
            call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_Hydra_Special_End )
            call PauseUnitBJ( true, udg_boss_hydra )
            call PauseUnitBJ( true, udg_boss_wtch )
            call SetUnitLifePercentBJ( udg_boss_wtch, 100 )
            set udg_boss_wtch_vuln = false
            call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Door_08_NonCinematic )
        else
        endif
        call CinematicFadeBJ( bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEOUT, 1.00, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\Black_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0 )
        call TriggerSleepAction( 2 )
        call RemoveUnit( udg_player_character )
        call DialogSetMessageBJ( udg_death_dialog, "TRIGSTR_396" )
        call DialogDisplayBJ( true, udg_death_dialog, udg_player )
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Death takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Death = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Death, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Death, function Trig_Death_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Respawn
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Respawn_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_checkpoint == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Respawn_Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_checkpoint == 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Respawn_Func009C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_checkpoint == 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Respawn_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call CinematicFadeBJ( bj_CINEFADETYPE_FADEIN, 1.00, "ReplaceableTextures\\CameraMasks\\Black_mask.blp", 0, 0, 0, 0 )
    set udg_p[1] = GetRectCenter(udg_death_checkpoint_region[udg_checkpoint])
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n000', udg_player, udg_p[1], bj_UNIT_FACING )
    set udg_player_character = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Periodic_Cam )
    call RemoveLocation (udg_p[1])
    if ( Trig_Respawn_Func007C() ) then
        set bj_forLoopAIndex = 1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd = 3
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            set udg_boss_turt_milestone[GetForLoopIndexA()] = false
            set bj_forLoopAIndex = bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call SetUnitAnimation( udg_rage_crystal[1], "stand portrait" )
        call SetUnitUserData( udg_rage_crystal[1], 0 )
        set udg_p[1] = GetRectCenter(gg_rct_TurtleSpawn)
        call SetUnitPositionLoc( udg_boss_turtle, udg_p[1] )
        call RemoveLocation (udg_p[1])
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Respawn_Func008C() ) then
        set bj_forLoopAIndex = 1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd = 3
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            set udg_boss_turt_milestone[GetForLoopIndexA()] = false
            set bj_forLoopAIndex = bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call SetUnitAnimation( udg_rage_crystal[2], "stand portrait" )
        call SetUnitUserData( udg_rage_crystal[2], 0 )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Respawn_Func009C() ) then
        set udg_p[1] = GetRectCenter(gg_rct_SeaWitch)
        call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ( udg_boss_wtch, udg_p[1], 160.00 )
        call SetUnitAnimation( udg_rage_crystal[3], "stand portrait" )
        call SetUnitUserData( udg_rage_crystal[3], 0 )
    else
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction( 2 )
    call PlayMusicBJ( gg_snd_TempleTheme )
    set udg_action_disabled = false
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Respawn takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Respawn = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterDialogEventBJ( gg_trg_Respawn, udg_death_dialog )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Respawn, function Trig_Respawn_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Checkpoint01
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Checkpoint01_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_checkpoint = 1
    call DisableTrigger( GetTriggeringTrigger() )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Checkpoint01 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Checkpoint01 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_Checkpoint01, gg_rct_Checkpoint01 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Checkpoint01, function Trig_Checkpoint01_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Checkpoint02
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Checkpoint02_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_checkpoint = 2
    call DisableTrigger( GetTriggeringTrigger() )
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Checkpoint02, function Trig_Checkpoint02_Actions )

//===========================================================================
function InitCustomTriggers takes nothing returns nothing
    call InitTrig_Initialization(  )
    call InitTrig_Environment_Load(  )
    call InitTrig_Setup(  )
    call InitTrig_Periodic_Cam(  )
    call InitTrig_New_Unit(  )
    call InitTrig_Rage_Crystal_End(  )
    call InitTrig_Door_01(  )
    call InitTrig_Door_02(  )
    call InitTrig_Door_03(  )
    call InitTrig_Door_04(  )
    call InitTrig_Door_05(  )
    call InitTrig_Door_06(  )
    call InitTrig_Door_07(  )
    call InitTrig_Door_08(  )
    call InitTrig_Boulder_01(  )
    call InitTrig_Boulder_02(  )
    call InitTrig_Boulder_03(  )
    call InitTrig_Boulder_04(  )
    call InitTrig_Boulder_05(  )
    call InitTrig_Boulder_06(  )
    call InitTrig_Boulder_07(  )
    call InitTrig_Boulder_08(  )
    call InitTrig_Ergl_Swim_01(  )
    call InitTrig_Ergl_Swim_02(  )
    call InitTrig_Cinematic_Frame_Change(  )
    call InitTrig_Cinematic_Frames(  )
    call InitTrig_Door_01_Cinematic(  )
    call InitTrig_Door_02_Cinematic(  )
    call InitTrig_Door_02_NonCinematic(  )
    call InitTrig_Door_02_Murgul(  )
    call InitTrig_Door_04_Cinematic(  )
    call InitTrig_Door_04_NonCinematic(  )
    call InitTrig_Door_04_Notice_Turtle(  )
    call InitTrig_Turtle_Door_Close(  )
    call InitTrig_Door_06_Cinematic(  )
    call InitTrig_Door_06_NonCinematic(  )
    call InitTrig_Naga1_Cinematic(  )
    call InitTrig_Naga2_Cinematic(  )
    call InitTrig_Door_08_Cinematic(  )
    call InitTrig_Door_08_NonCinematic(  )
    call InitTrig_Face_Witch(  )
    call InitTrig_Periodic_Runes(  )
    call InitTrig_Mouse_Move(  )
    call InitTrig_Mouse_Press(  )
    call InitTrig_Mouse_Release(  )
    call InitTrig_Attack_End(  )
    call InitTrig_Periodic_Projectiles(  )
    call InitTrig_Aim_Periodic(  )
    call InitTrig_Swim_Enable(  )
    call InitTrig_Swim_Periodic(  )
    call InitTrig_Swim_Vulnerable(  )
    call InitTrig_Swim_End(  )
    call InitTrig_Sea_Witch_Swim_Periodic(  )
    call InitTrig_Sea_Witch_Swim_Timer(  )
    call InitTrig_Sea_Witch_Swim_Ready(  )
    call InitTrig_Hydra_Attack(  )
    call InitTrig_Hydra_Special_Start(  )
    call InitTrig_Hydra_Periodic_Special(  )
    call InitTrig_Hydra_Periodic_Lock(  )
    call InitTrig_Hydra_Special_End(  )
    call InitTrig_Hydra_Special_Ready(  )
    call InitTrig_Hydra_Fog_Darken(  )
    call InitTrig_Hydra_Fog_Normal(  )
    call InitTrig_Hydra_Impact(  )
    call InitTrig_Turtle_Setup(  )
    call InitTrig_Dragon_Turtle_Attack(  )
    call InitTrig_Dragon_Turtle_Legs(  )
    call InitTrig_Dragon_Turtle_Special(  )
    call InitTrig_Dragon_Turtle_Special_End(  )
    call InitTrig_Spawn_Turtle_Hatch(  )
    call InitTrig_Take_Damage(  )
    call InitTrig_Player_Hit_Immunity(  )
    call InitTrig_Spawn_Enemies(  )
    call InitTrig_Create_Projectiles(  )
    call InitTrig_Clear_Projectiles(  )
    call InitTrig_Death(  )
    call InitTrig_Respawn(  )
    call InitTrig_Checkpoint01(  )
    call InitTrig_Checkpoint02(  )
    call InitTrig_Checkpoint03(  )
    call InitTrig_Checkpoint04(  )
    call InitTrig_Checkpoint05(  )
    call InitTrig_Checkpoint06(  )
    call InitTrig_Checkpoint07(  )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function RunInitializationTriggers takes nothing returns nothing
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_Initialization )
endfunction

//***************************************************************************
//*
//*  Players
//*
//***************************************************************************

function InitCustomPlayerSlots takes nothing returns nothing

    // Player 0
    call SetPlayerStartLocation( Player(0), 0 )
    call ForcePlayerStartLocation( Player(0), 0 )
    call SetPlayerColor( Player(0), ConvertPlayerColor(0) )
    call SetPlayerRacePreference( Player(0), RACE_PREF_HUMAN )
    call SetPlayerRaceSelectable( Player(0), false )
    call SetPlayerController( Player(0), MAP_CONTROL_USER )

endfunction

function InitCustomTeams takes nothing returns nothing
    // Force: TRIGSTR_006
    call SetPlayerTeam( Player(0), 0 )

endfunction

//***************************************************************************
//*
//*  Main Initialization
//*
//***************************************************************************

//===========================================================================
function main takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetCameraBounds( -3072.0 + GetCameraMargin(CAMERA_MARGIN_LEFT), -5632.0 + GetCameraMargin(CAMERA_MARGIN_BOTTOM), 13312.0 - GetCameraMargin(CAMERA_MARGIN_RIGHT), 6656.0 - GetCameraMargin(CAMERA_MARGIN_TOP), -3072.0 + GetCameraMargin(CAMERA_MARGIN_LEFT), 6656.0 - GetCameraMargin(CAMERA_MARGIN_TOP), 13312.0 - GetCameraMargin(CAMERA_MARGIN_RIGHT), -5632.0 + GetCameraMargin(CAMERA_MARGIN_BOTTOM) )
    call SetDayNightModels( "Environment\\DNC\\DNCLordaeron\\DNCLordaeronTerrain\\DNCLordaeronTerrain.mdl", "Environment\\DNC\\DNCLordaeron\\DNCLordaeronUnit\\DNCLordaeronUnit.mdl" )
    call SetTerrainFogEx( 0, 0.0, 2200.0, 0.500, 0.196, 0.471, 0.471 )
    call NewSoundEnvironment( "Default" )
    call SetAmbientDaySound( "SunkenRuinsDay" )
    call SetAmbientNightSound( "SunkenRuinsNight" )
    call SetMapMusic( "Music", true, 0 )
    call InitSounds(  )
    call CreateRegions(  )
    call CreateCameras(  )
    call CreateAllDestructables(  )
    call CreateAllUnits(  )
    call InitBlizzard(  )
    call InitGlobals(  )
    call InitCustomTriggers(  )
    call RunInitializationTriggers(  )

endfunction

//***************************************************************************
//*
//*  Map Configuration
//*
//***************************************************************************

function config takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetMapName( "TRIGSTR_001" )
    call SetMapDescription( "TRIGSTR_003" )
    call SetPlayers( 1 )
    call SetTeams( 1 )
    call SetGamePlacement( MAP_PLACEMENT_USE_MAP_SETTINGS )

    call DefineStartLocation( 0, 6272.0, -3776.0 )

    // Player setup
    call InitCustomPlayerSlots(  )
    call InitCustomTeams(  )
endfunction
